name: GPT-5: The Future of AI by OpenAI – Review, Pricing & Alternatives
short_description: Discover the revolutionary GPT-5 model created by OpenAI. Detailed exploration of the capabilities, applications, and impact of this next-generation AI model.
full_description: Audio episode : GPT-5 — what’s new 8 min ▶ Listen GPT-5: The Future of AI by OpenAI – Review, Pricing & Alternatives GPT-5 , OpenAI’s latest creation, is now entering the field of large LLM models. This comprehensive model brings together and surpasses all AI models available worldwide. It includes 4o models, OpenAI’s O-series reasoning, autonomous agents, and strong mathematical skills. Built to be more reliable and better suited to professional tasks, this tool is changing the way humans and AI work together. Remember: this is a major change, not just a simple update. ➥ So, what’s GPT-5? GPT-5 is the 5th generation of generative models pre-trained by OpenAI. It’s the most powerful LLM model available in ChatGPT, and it’s been officially available since August 7, 2025. It uses the GPT architecture, while adding improvements from reasoning-focused models. A long-term research project This model is the culmination of OpenAI’s research into logic, sequential thought processes, and multi-format design. It is, in fact, the most powerful model ever developed by the company. In addition, it brings significant improvements to all components of ChatGPT, whether it be the API or the various tools for developers. (Context window also expanded to 256,000 tokens) ➥ How does GPT-5 work? This model functions as a coordinated system, capable of automatically providing the best version of ChatGPT for your request. There is no longer a need to manually select a specific model. It is faster and more accurate, especially for specific tasks such as writing, programming, or medical research. Safety first One of its new features is “secure completion.” This feature allows the ChatGPT assistant to give the most useful answer possible while respecting clear security limits. It can also explain why it cannot help you in certain cases. (This helps to understand the limitations of AI.) Reasoning and contextual understanding GPT-5’s reasoning abilities have been greatly improved. It can now solve more difficult problems, especially those that require multiple steps of reasoning. Initial tests suggest that it can solve complex problems, almost like someone with a PhD. Improved multimodal capabilities Also, it has multi-format features, handling text, images, sounds, and videos. Of course, it can easily connect to tools like Sora for video creation and Whisper for audio transcription. Integrated autonomous agents GPT-5 includes enhanced AI agent capabilities. This means it can perform tasks on its own. You can now entrust it with complex missions. These range from planning a complete trip with multiple stops to managing different tasks across multiple software applications. The GPT 5 model also offers good integration with commonly used services such as Gmail , Google Calendar, and Google Contacts. The magic of real-time learning While previous language models relied solely on previous training, GPT-5 incorporates new data from real-time user queries. This method is also known as “computing at test time.” This ability to instantly assimilate and use new information marks an important development. It makes exchanges even more accurate and context-appropriate. Watch the official OpenAI conference ➥ What’s new in GPT-5? In-depth reasoning GPT-5 no longer simply responds: it deploys multi-step reasoning, structures its responses, and justifies its choices, making exchanges much more relevant and professional. This ability to “think in steps” revolutionizes its use in business and education. Advanced multimodality The new model processes text, images, and data more naturally and is geared toward the future integration of video. GPT-5 is very good at simultaneously analyzing different types of documents, facilitating visual workflows and complex problem solving. Drastic reduction in hallucinations Reliability is one of the strengths of this powerful model, with a factual error rate up to 45% lower than the previous version, and “safe completions” mechanisms to avoid misleading or inaccurate responses. Expanded context window GPT-5 now handles up to 256,000 tokens , allowing it to assimilate long exchanges, large PDFs, or large blocks of code without losing track of the conversation. Code performance The model has established itself as a valuable programming collaborator, able to write, review, and correct complex projects in record time, with superior performance on benchmark tests and a significant reduction in error rates. Customization, voice, and education Tone selection, visual customization, improved voice modes, and above all “Study Mode,” an interactive mode designed for learning, make GPT-5 a comprehensive tool that can be adapted to each user profile. ➥ 4 new chat personalities This is brand new! You can now choose a character from the ChatGPT interface. The new feature lets you chat with conversation styles that are more suited to your preferences. Cynic: In Cynic mode, GPT-5 adopts a sharp and clear-eyed tone, dismantling preconceived ideas and highlighting blind spots with measured irony—useful for testing the strength of an argument or spotting the “hype” behind a claim. Robot: In Robot mode, GPT-5 responds in a factual, concise, and structured manner, with a neutral style similar to technical documentation—ideal for procedures, checklists, and no-frills answers. Listener: The Listener mode prioritizes empathy, reformulates the need, and, when necessary, asks clarifying questions in order to provide context-aware answers that are genuinely useful in the exchange. Nerd: The Nerd mode focuses on precision, technical details, and references—perfect for delving deeper into a topic, comparing approaches, or exploring nuances and edge cases. ➥ Pros and cons GPT 5 is one of the most effective artificial intelligence models currently available. However, like any technological device, it has significant strengths and aspects that could be seen as limitations. Enhanced Reliability : This model reduces factual errors and “hallucinations,” providing more accurate and trustworthy answers. Improved Multimodality : It can process and generate information from text, images, audio, and video, greatly expanding application areas. Advanced Reasoning : GPT-5 excels at solving complex problems, with analysis skills comparable to expert-level reasoning. Agent Capabilities : Autonomous multi-step task handling and integration with external applications streamline process execution. Improved Coding and Writing : Assists in software design, bug fixing, and producing high-quality text with better style adaptation. A Perfect AI? Despite these advancements, it is of course not flawless, full access to the most advanced features still requires paid subscriptions. Furthermore, even with significant improvements, the quest for Artificial General Intelligence ( AGI ) is far from over. In fact, the model does not learn continuously like a human being. (Note: continuous learning is still a challenge). ➥ Available Versions: GPT-5, Mini and Nano Screenshot from the official OpenAI.com website For everyone: Access to standard GPT-5 and GPT-5 Mini (faster and lighter version) depending on quota and subscription plan. For advanced/Pro users: Access to GPT-5 Pro (maximum capabilities, higher speed and improved reliability). For developers via API: GPT-5, GPT-5 Mini, and GPT-5 Nano versions available based on performance or cost requirements. The platform automatically selects the best model for the task, ensuring optimal performance every time. No manual selection is required. ➥ What is the price of GPT-5? GPT-5 is available to all ChatGPT users, including those using the free version. However, only subscribers with the “Pro” option, billed at $200 per month, have unlimited access to this newly released model. The model is now the default mode across all versions of the application. The pricing structure is straightforward: Free : €0/month – Unlimited access to a standard-level AI, with possible restrictions to prevent abuse. Plus : €24/month – Enhanced intelligence and better performance, similar to the previous ChatGPT Plus offering. Pro : €80–€120/month – Full access to GPT-5 at the highest intelligence level, including OpenAI’s most advanced tools and integrations. Team : GPT-5 is also available for teams, with custom pricing (group subscriptions, volume discounts, or enterprise contracts). ➥ Who is GPT-5 for? GPT-5 is designed for a wide range of professionals and organizations seeking to enhance their capabilities through artificial intelligence. Its advanced structure and diverse performance capabilities make it highly useful for multiple industries. For Developers and Technology Companies This model is a valuable resource for developers. It simplifies software creation, testing, and code deployment through tools such as GitHub Copilot and Visual Studio Code. Companies using Microsoft 365 Copilot will benefit from its ability to analyze complex questions and maintain consistency in long conversations. This makes it possible to apply OpenAI’s latest models to professional tasks for increased productivity. For Legal and Healthcare Professionals Law firms such as Harvey and Spellbook have had early access to GPT-5. They have observed that it detects legal nuances and compliance issues that previous models missed. In the healthcare field, the model is highly effective at answering questions and can identify potential concerns with great accuracy. For Content Creators and Researchers Improvements in writing and multi-format capabilities make GPT-5 particularly relevant for content creators, journalists, and researchers. It offers consistent text production and in-depth data analysis. (This greatly facilitates research and creation). What is GPT-5 used for? Research and Innovation: Speeds up idea generation, simplifies the synthesis of scientific studies, and helps explore new concepts across various fields (medicine, engineering, law, etc.). Education: Offers interactive explanations, personalized exercises, and helps students understand complex topics at their own pace. Content Creation: Generates articles, video scripts, stories, and even coherent images from text prompts. Programming: Enables automated writing and debugging of computer code, bug analysis, and technical documentation. ➥ Similar alternatives to GPT-5 While GPT-5 sets a new benchmark in the field of artificial intelligence, there are many similar AIs on the market that offer equally interesting models. Here is a list of them: Model Name Key Strengths Target Audience Google Gemini Extensive multimodal capabilities, integrated into the Google ecosystem (Gmail, Docs), long context window. Google Workspace users, businesses, developers. Anthropic Claude Prioritizes safety and ethics, strong performance in conversation and answering questions. Businesses and industries where security and compliance are critical. Mistral AI Models that generate text efficiently and at lower cost. Startups, cost-conscious companies, developers. Perplexity AI Provides detailed answers with sources, focused on research and deep learning. Researchers, academics, those seeking verified information. Cohere Command R+ Specialized in natural language processing, powerful tools for text generation and analysis. Developers, businesses looking to integrate advanced language models. IBM Watson AI solutions designed for enterprises, including natural language processing and data analysis. Large enterprises, large-scale AI projects. Meta Llama 4 Open-source model, high flexibility for developers looking to customize their solutions. Developers, researchers, companies with customization needs. Microsoft Copilot Integrates Microsoft AI capabilities for daily tasks, assists with answers, writing, and visual creation. General public, users of the Microsoft ecosystem. ➥ Review of GPT-5 The arrival of GPT-5 has generated strong interest in the tech world. Many see it as a key milestone for artificial general intelligence. Sam Altman , CEO of OpenAI, described interacting with the new model as akin to having a conversation with a PhD-level expert. He even expressed a feeling of “ no longer being useful ” in the face of its performance. Initial feedback from companies that have tested it, such as Amgen, shows improved accuracy, reliability, and speed compared to previous systems. A final positive review Despite high expectations, some observers are tempering predictions of a performance leap as dramatic as that between GPT-3 and GPT-4. However, the consolidation of capabilities and reduction in errors are increasing confidence in its applications. Nevertheless, GPT-5 confirms OpenAI’s position as the world leader in artificial intelligence models. ➥ FAQ What are the main improvements in GPT-5? + The main improvements in GPT-5 include reduced hallucinations, better programming and writing skills, more refined contextual understanding, expanded multimodality (text, audio, video), and more advanced agent capabilities. Can GPT-5 be integrated with other tools? + Yes, it can easily connect to popular external applications such as Gmail and Google Calendar. Developer integrations are also available. When is GPT-5 available and for whom? + GPT-5 has been available since August 7, 2025, for all ChatGPT users, including Free, Plus, Pro, and Team accounts. Enterprise and Edu users will gain access about one week after launch. Is GPT-5 free or paid? + GPT-5 is accessible for free, but paid accounts (Plus, Pro, Team) enjoy higher usage quotas and advanced features. When limits are reached, free accounts may switch to a “mini” version of the model. Can GPT-5 be used via the API? + Yes, GPT-5 is available through the OpenAI API platform with different profiles (gpt-5, gpt-5-mini, gpt-5-nano, gpt-5-chat) to meet varied needs in cost, speed, and reasoning quality. What safety measures are in place with GPT-5? + GPT-5 includes “safe completions”: it prioritizes safe responses, avoids dangerous instructions or inappropriate requests, clearly states its limitations, and reduces the risk of misleading answers (while remaining helpful). Are my data used to train GPT-5? + OpenAI states that conversations may be used to improve the models, but users can disable conversation history in their account’s privacy settings. How do I access GPT-5 in ChatGPT? + The web or mobile version of ChatGPT automatically uses GPT-5 by default, with no setup required. For more complex tasks, you can explicitly request “think carefully about this” in the prompt to activate maximum reasoning. What are the differences between GPT-4 and GPT-5? + GPT-5 handles all formats (text, images, etc.), provides faster responses, fewer errors, and enables much longer, more contextual conversations than before. It merges specialized modes (writing, coding, reasoning, etc.) into a single model. That’s it for this presentation, now it’s time to try it out! Visit GPT-5 website

name: Eleven Music: AI music generator with studio-quality sound (Review)
short_description: Eleven Music is an AI-powered music generator that produces studio-quality music based on textual descriptions. This music model was created by ElevenLabs.
full_description: Eleven Music: AI music generator with studio-quality sound (Review) Eleven Music is a tool for creating high-quality musical works using AI. Developed by ElevenLabs, this artificial intelligence is capable of producing realistic, studio-quality songs in record time. A simple prompt (text instruction) is all it takes to generate music with instruments and vocals. This AI song generator features original tracks, with or without vocals, ready for use in a variety of projects. ➥ What is Eleven Music? Eleven Music is the latest innovation from ElevenLabs, a company already known for its expertise in AI-powered voice synthesis. This hi-tech tool turns a detailed written description into a complete piece of music. The main goal is to make music composition more accessible by reducing the usual technical challenges. High-fidelity audio technology At the heart of this system is their own unique artificial intelligence model. It has been trained using high-quality audio recordings. As a result, the sound achieved reaches a frequency of 44.1 kHz, ensuring faithful and highly professional reproduction. Overall, Elevenlabs’ AI music generator captures the complexity of the musical world well, making it well suited to artistic endeavors. (Key takeaway: sound quality is a strong point.) Try Eleven Music ➥ How does Eleven Music work? This audio tool is really easy to use. In short, you write down your idea for the music, specifying the genre, mood, style, or sound elements you want. Then, the algorithm translates this information into a coherent and enjoyable audio track. Screenshot from the official website Elevenlabs.com A quick step-by-step guide To begin with, you need to enter a description using everyday words. For example, you could ask for « epic film music, with strings that sound like a triumph and strong percussion » . The ingenuity of this device is that it also allows you to refine the piece section by section. You can edit specific segments, change their duration, any lyrics, or even the overall style. This gives you complete control over the final result. Seamless integration This music app also has an application programming interface (API). This allows it to be integrated directly into various applications or workflows. Developers can thus add the ability to produce melodies in real time, with great accuracy in terms of style and structure. This integration with the API opens up new (and powerful) possibilities for AI-generated music. Discover Eleven Music in Action Demo of ElevenLabs AI Music Generator ➥ Pros and cons This method of producing sound has several clear advantages, but it also raises logical questions. Its ease of use and the quality of the sounds produced are among its strengths. However, discussions about artistic creation by artificial intelligence continue. High-quality sound: The music sounds incredibly realistic and professional. Ease of use: Just a simple prompt is enough to start composing. Precise control: Each track can be edited for fine-tuned customization. Commercial potential: The generated music can be used for commercial purposes, under specific conditions. Ethical copyright approach: The company has signed agreements with organizations like Merlin Network and Kobalt Music Group to protect creators. (important for legal compliance ) Despite these positive points, doubts remain. The cost can quickly increase with intensive use. The debate about the impact of these techniques on the work of human musicians, and on what art itself is, is still ongoing. Try Eleven Music ➥ What is the price of Eleven Music? ElevenLabs offers several pricing plans to suit different uses. These range from personal trials to the needs of large companies. Prices are generally based on the number of credits used, which correspond to minutes of audio creation. Free Plan: This option lets you explore the tool with a limit of 10,000 credits per month, equivalent to around 10 minutes of audio content. Starter Plan: Available for around $5/month, it offers more credits and a license for commercial use of your creations. Creator Plan: Designed for professionals needing more features, this plan starts at $10 for the first month. Plus & Enterprise Plans: Custom solutions are available for organizations and high-volume users. These come with personalized pricing and extra features. Please note that annual billing may result in discounts on various types of subscriptions. These prices are subject to change. ➥ Who is ElevenLabs Music intended for? That’s an excellent question. Since this is a music generator designed to be easy to use, it appeals to a wide audience. This includes both music professionals and amateurs. So if you want to produce soundtracks for one of your projects, this AI music generator could be just what you’re looking for. For musicians and composers Even musical artists can benefit from this tool. It can be used to explore new avenues, quickly generate demos, or overcome moments of creative block. It’s a real boost for new compositions or a way to test out new sounds. For audio and video content creators Do you create soundtracks for films, background music for podcasts, advertising jingles, or background music for video games? This music creation assistant is designed for you. If you are an artist and multimedia developer, you can quickly produce customized works that perfectly match the desired atmosphere. (Ideal for saving time.) For video game professionals Indeed, it is extremely practical for video game developers who can produce immersive soundtracks, background music for levels, or melodies for menus. Everything can be precisely adjusted to fit the game’s universe. For businesses and brands For companies looking to create recognizable sound identities, musical themes for events, or advertising campaigns, this is an effective way to achieve their goals. It provides valuable flexibility for creating audio material for professional use. Try Eleven Music ➥ Alternatives to Eleven Music Even though Eleven Music stands out as one of the best AI music generators due to its approach to copyright, several other solutions are worth exploring for their unique features. Tool Name Estimated Price Key Feature Strength Suno Multiple plans, including a free version. Generates full songs with lyrics and vocals. Focuses on lyric writing and AI-generated singing voices. Udio Similar to Suno, includes free options. Fast music creation with impressive vocals. Outstanding vocal quality performance. Kits AI Free and premium plans available. Singer voice and instrument sound generator. Can edit vocal recordings and create virtual instruments. Murf AI Various subscription options. All-in-one voice studio with royalty-free music. Specializes in realistic voice-overs with background tracks. ➥ Reviews about Eleven Music The general opinion on Eleven Music is quite positive. Its rendering quality and ease of use are highlighted. However, let’s be honest: some voices are raised to express reservations about the long-term impact of these technologies on the world of classical music. That said, many people praise the accuracy of the compositions produced and the possibility of achieving professional results without any prior musical knowledge. FAQ Is Eleven Music beginner-friendly? + Absolutely! The interface is designed to be intuitive and easy to use. It allows anyone to create soundtracks, even without any prior experience in music composition. Can I use music created with Eleven Music for commercial projects? + Yes, commercial use is allowed under certain conditions. These usually depend on the subscription plan you choose. It’s recommended to review the terms of use for full details. How does Eleven Music handle copyright? + ElevenLabs has partnered with rights management organizations such as Merlin Network and Kobalt Music Group. These agreements ensure the protection of copyright holders. The platform also clearly prohibits imitating existing styles or artists. Is Eleven Music accessible via an API? + The Eleven Music API is currently in development and will soon be available for integration into other apps and workflows. So don’t wait, start composing your song now! Visit Eleven Music website

name: Genie 3 by Google DeepMind: AI starts creating realistic simulations in real time
short_description: Genie 3 is an AI model developed by Google DeepMind that can create interactive virtual worlds in 720p at 24 fps. Thanks to its visual memory, you can explore several minutes of coherent scenes that can be modified via text.
full_description: Audio episode : Genie 3 — highlights 12 min ▶ Listen Genie 3 by Google DeepMind: AI starts creating realistic simulations in real time What if a simple sentence were enough to bring to life a 3D world that is playable, coherent, and ready to explore? That’s exactly what Genie 3, the new simulation model from Google DeepMind, promises to do. More than just a video generator, it’s a true “universe modeler” that you can interact with in real time. Intriguing, isn’t it? ➥ What exactly is Genie 3? Imagine writing “a snow-covered forest at sunset” and seeing that world appear… then being able to walk around in it like in a video game. Genie 3 is an AI model designed to create interactive 3D environments from simple text descriptions. Unlike its predecessors (Genie 1 and 2), it focuses on image stability and interactivity, with a clear ambition: to serve as a virtual training ground for increasingly autonomous AI systems. Screenshot from the official Deepmind.google website In other words, before learning in the real world, agents can practice in simulated, credible, and dynamic environments. It’s a bit like an ultra-realistic simulator… but generated entirely on the fly. ➥ Why this model is impressive Replicates physical phenomena: light, water, movements, and natural events. Creates fictional worlds: animated scenes and reconstructed historical locations. Instant generation: images produced in real-time as actions occur, like in an interactive game. You look at a door, open it, and the set changes right before your eyes. Can you picture it? Some even go so far as to say that this new breakthrough reinforces the simulation hypothesis —nothing less! Discover Genie 3 in action Dynamic worlds where you can navigate in real time ➥ How it works (without technical jargon) Genie 3 operates in an “autoregressive” manner: at any given moment, it takes into account what it has already shown and what the user has just done to create the next image. In other words, it has a kind of short-term memory that allows it to keep track of the scene, objects, and actions. The result: an interactive environment that is constantly evolving, not just a video that you watch passively. ➥ Create a world with just text To generate an environment, we describe what we want to see, for example: “A cyberpunk alley bathed in neon and rain” “An ancient temple in the middle of a lush jungle” “A silent space station with a view of a giant planet” Example of a prompt for Genie 3 In just a few seconds, the world appears in 720p, running smoothly at 24 frames per second, and you can move around it just like in a traditional game (using a keyboard/mouse, controller, etc.). ➥ An amazing memory of the world This is one of Genie 3’s superpowers: it “remembers” objects, textures, and modifications for several minutes. If you leave a mark on a wall, modify a table, or move an object, these changes will remain even after you leave the area and return. Everything can be changed! Even better, you can trigger “global events” with text: change the weather, make characters appear, modify a setting in real time. Imagine setting up a scene, then saying “a sandstorm is coming” and seeing the world react instantly. It opens up enormous creative possibilities. Screenshot from the official Deepmind.google website ➥ What is its practical use? Training and simulation: robots and autonomous agents (warehousing, rescue, navigation, manipulation). Rapid prototyping: for video games and animation. Immersive education: historical reconstructions, interactive science experiments. Content creation: quick test scenes without lengthy 3D modeling. Want to test a game level idea in one hour instead of a week? That’s the kind of promise. ➥ What we like… and what still needs work Good things Live-playable 3D worlds. Visual stability over several minutes. Changes triggered by simple text instructions. Excellent training ground for AI agents and simulations. Ideal for quickly testing content ideas. Negative points Limited interaction time (a few minutes). Difficult management of complex interactions between multiple agents. Imperfect fidelity for real-world locations. Occasionally blurry or illegible generated text. Possible small physical inconsistencies (“strange” images). Requires significant computing power. Have you ever seen AI “forget” a detail or generate a slightly crooked chair? Here, that can happen, but the direction is clearly the right one. ➥ How much does it cost? For now, Genie 3 is not available to the general public. It is available in “research preview” mode to a small group of researchers and creators. No official price has been announced at this stage. Keep an eye out for any announcements regarding an expanded or commercial version ➥ Who is it for? Today: researchers in AI, robotics, autonomous agents. Tomorrow: game studios, video creators, animators, R&D teams. And more generally: education, training, simulation, creative experimentation. To sum up: a perfect tool for quick testing, risk-free learning, and big thinking. ➥ Some alternatives to Genie 3 (comparison table) Here are some fairly similar tools, although Genie 3 stands out for its real-time interactivity in a generated 3D world: Platform Type Feature Performance Purpose Google Genie 3 AI World Generator Interactive 3D environments from text 720p, 24 FPS Limited research, virtual world creation Decart Oasis Real-time world model AI-generated Minecraft gameplay 20 FPS Interactive game based on diffusion transformers Nvidia Isaac Lab Simulation environment Programmable, reproducible simulators Variable depending on config Training robots and autonomous vehicles Unity (with AI) Real-time rendering engine Creation of interactive AR/VR experiences Up to 4K depending on hardware Commercial development platform Cesium + Unreal Engine 5 Geospatial simulation Photorealistic 3D environments with real-world data 4K+, variable performance Defense, training, geosimulation Question for you: do you prefer interactive worlds generated on the fly, or ultra-realistic but unplayable videos? The choice varies depending on the use case. ➥ Our review Genie 3 caused a sensation as soon as it was unveiled, and for good reason: it marks a step forward toward coherent, playable, and responsive worlds, where other models were content to simply generate videos. Yes, there are still limitations (duration, multi-agents, physical accuracy), and the question of the necessary resources is very real. But the trajectory is exciting: a pivotal tool for research and an accelerator for creation, simulation, and, ultimately, smarter systems. Something to think about A little anecdote to finish: imagine a robot that learns to open a door in a virtual apartment generated on demand, then immediately relearns in a warehouse, then in the mountains, simply because we “told” the system to do so. This isn’t science fiction, it’s the vision that Genie 3 is taking us towards. ➥ FAQ: 15 most frequently asked questions Is Genie 3 a video game? + No. It’s an AI technology capable of generating worlds you can play in and interact with—similar to a game engine, but controlled entirely through text prompts. What is the image quality and frame rate? + Environments are rendered in 720p at 24 frames per second. Does it handle multiple agents interacting with each other? + Not very well for now, especially when it comes to complex interactions. When will it be available to everyone? + No public release date has been announced yet. The current version is reserved for research purposes. Can it perfectly recreate Paris or Tokyo? + Not at the moment. Genie 3 excels in imaginative creations but still struggles with precise real-world geographic accuracy. What’s the difference between Genie 3 and ChatGPT? + ChatGPT generates text, while Genie 3 creates interactive 3D virtual worlds. While ChatGPT helps you write and think, Genie 3 literally lets you explore AI-generated universes in real time! How can I use Genie 3 for free? + For now, Genie 3 is not publicly accessible for free. Google DeepMind has limited it to a small group of researchers as part of a “restricted research” program. No free version has been announced. Genie 3 vs Oasis: Which is better for world creation? + Genie 3 excels at freely creating varied environments from text descriptions, while Oasis focuses on Minecraft-style experiences. Genie 3 offers greater creative flexibility, but Oasis is currently available to the public. Can you play games created with Genie 3? + Yes, but with limitations! Genie 3 environments are explorable and interactive like a game, but sessions only last a few minutes. It’s not yet a full-fledged game engine—more of a generator for short interactive experiences. When will Genie 3 be available to the general public? + No official release date has been provided by Google DeepMind. The model remains in an advanced research phase. Experts estimate it may take several months—or even years—before public availability. What PC specs are required to run Genie 3? + Google DeepMind has not disclosed the exact hardware requirements. Given the model’s complexity, a high-end setup with a powerful GPU and plenty of RAM will likely be necessary. Access may be provided through cloud computing. Can Genie 3 create animated characters? + Partially! Genie 3 can include animated elements within its environments but is not specialized in creating complex characters. Its main strength remains generating interactive environments and scenery. Will Genie 3 revolutionize the video game industry? + Potentially, yes! Genie 3 could transform level prototyping and speed up environment creation. However, traditional engines like Unity will still be essential for fully optimized, complete games. Can you export worlds created with Genie 3? + Google DeepMind has not confirmed this feature. In theory, generated environments could be converted to other formats, but no technical details have been shared about export capabilities. Can Genie 3 create educational environments for schools? + Absolutely! This is one of its most promising applications. Imagine recreating Ancient Rome for a history class or exploring the inside of a cell in biology. Genie 3 offers groundbreaking opportunities for immersive learning. Learn more and give it a try! Visit Genie 3 by Google website

name: OpenAI’s Open Model: GPT-oss models are open source and free
short_description: Discover OpenAI's new open-source models, gpt-oss-120b and gpt-oss-20b. Powerful for reasoning and tool use, licensed under Apache 2.0.
full_description: Audio episode : GPT-OSS – what’s inside? 15 min ▶ Listen OpenAI’s Open Model: GPT-oss models are open source and free OpenAI’s open-source models , especially the recent gpt-oss-120b and gpt-oss-20b , are changing how AI applications are built. They offer developers greater freedom and control over systems that were previously more restricted. These free models feature advanced reasoning, opening up new avenues for smarter tools. ➥ What are OpenAI’s open models? OpenAI’s open models are large language models whose “weights” (the parameters derived from their training) are public. Unlike traditional proprietary solutions, this means that developers can download them and run them on their own hardware, or put them in customized environments. This approach allows for more experimentation and fine-tuning of models to the specific requirements of each project. The distinction: open source versus free source code It is important to understand that an open-weight model is not the same as a model with completely open source code. In fact, an open source model provides access to the complete code, training data, and methods for building it. Available under Apache License 2.0 However, OpenAI’s open-weight models share the “weights” under a fairly permissive license, such as Apache 2.0 . This makes it possible to use, adapt, and even sell them without the usual restrictions of “copyleft” or patent issues. This difference is important in understanding the full freedom given to designers. (Please note) Screenshot from the official Gpt-oss.com website ➥ How to use OpenAI’s open models? To use OpenAI models, you often have to go through their programming interfaces (APIs) for proprietary versions. But open-weight models can also be installed directly on your machine. Models such as gpt-oss-120b and gpt-oss-20b run smoothly on personal computers — even on laptops or compact devices. This is a major advantage for data privacy and cost control, since processing can be done locally without always needing a remote server connection. Practical applications for developers These language processing systems are really useful for lots of things. For example, they can be used to create highly advanced conversational agents that understand the context and subtleties of human discussions. High-performance automation It can also be used to generate automatic content, such as product descriptions for e-commerce or summaries of complicated articles. (A real time-saver!) They can do (almost) anything! In addition, these models are very good for programming tasks, data analysis, and even for producing images or voice recognition. Their way of ‘reasoning’ can be adjusted for each task, ensuring fast results. Watch GPT-oss in Action Learn About the GPT-oss Open Source Models ➥ Pros and Cons Using OpenAI’s open-source models comes with significant advantages, but also some challenges to consider. The advantages include: Performance: These software architectures are among the most efficient on the market for a wide range of tasks, including advanced reasoning and multimodal interaction. Ease of access: API access makes integration into other solutions simpler, while open-weight models support local deployment. Versatility: They can handle a variety of functions, from text to voice, image generation, and code analysis. High customizability: Open-weight models allow for fine-tuned adjustments, ideal for specific or niche applications. However, there are also some drawbacks: Cost: Using these models via API can become expensive, especially for large-scale projects or smaller organizations. Complex integration: Even with simple APIs, developers new to AI might find system setup and deployment challenging. Dependency: Relying solely on OpenAI’s open models may leave you vulnerable to pricing or access policy changes. Data privacy: Sending data to external services may raise concerns about security and information confidentiality. Try the demo here Open in full screen ➥ What is the cost of OpenAI models? The cost of OpenAI models depends mainly on your usage. It is calculated based on the number of “tokens” processed. A token is a small piece of text, such as a word or part of a word. Prices vary greatly depending on the model, its performance, and its specific features. The model is free if used locally, of course. For reference, here are some example pricing figures (subject to change): GPT-4o: Around $2.50 per million input tokens and $10.00 per million output tokens. GPT-4o Mini: Approximately $0.15 per million input tokens and $0.60 per million output tokens. GPT-4.5 Preview: A more advanced model costing about $75.00 per million input tokens and $150.00 per million output tokens. “o” series models (e.g., o3): Around $2 per million input tokens and $8 per million output tokens. DALL·E 3 (image generation): Pricing ranges from $0.02 to $0.08 per image depending on resolution. Whisper (audio transcription): Approximately $0.006 per minute of audio. There are also costs for specific operations, such as fine-tuning models or text-to-speech services. It is important to note that subscriptions for the general public, such as ChatGPT Plus, do not apply to API usage for developers. ➥ Who are OpenAI models intended for? These tools are primarily intended for developers, researchers, and businesses seeking to add advanced cognitive capabilities to their projects. If you are building chatbots, content generation systems, or data analysis tools, the GPT OSS OpenAI models provide a solid foundation.. More specifically, they are suitable for: Businesses and startups: To automate tasks, enhance customer service with virtual agents, or personalize client experiences. App developers: Those looking to integrate natural language processing, computer vision, or code generation capabilities into their software. Research teams: To explore new directions in artificial intelligence and test hypotheses. Content creators: To generate ideas, write text, or create visuals more efficiently. Open-weight models, in particular, are an excellent choice for those who prefer local control, internal data security, or highly customized software. ➥ Alternatives to GPT OSS models Even though these open source models are already very popular in the world of AI, many other companies are introducing competing open source models that are effective. This field is constantly changing! Here are some similar alternative LLMs: Name Key Points Main Advantage Mistral AI French company offering high-performing models despite small size. Fast execution and resource efficiency. Qwen 3 (0.6B–235B) Dense & MoE family (30 B active / 235 B total), up to 128k token context, Apache 2.0 license. (Alibaba) Scalable suite, strong performance in reasoning, math, and code. DeepSeek R1 Reinforcement learning-based model (R1 / R1-Zero), distilled into smaller models (1.5–70B), MIT license. Advanced chain-of-thought abilities, efficient distillation, a strong OpenAI-o1 rival. Stability AI Known for image and audio generation models. Excellence in text-to-visual and audio conversion. Hugging Face A hub and community for open artificial intelligence. Access to a wide variety of open models, datasets, and tools. Meta (LLaMA) A family of large language models with open weights or source code. Transparency and strong customization potential. TII – Falcon 180B 180B parameters, trained on 3.5T tokens, Apache 2.0 license. Excellent for long-form and multilingual generation. BigScience – BLOOM 176B 176B parameters, public dataset & code, OpenRAIL-M license. Full transparency of training data and community-driven governance. Stability AI – StableLM 2 12B 12B parameters, trained on 2T tokens, Apache 2.0 license. Excellent size/quality ratio for lightweight deployment. Microsoft – Phi-3 Mini 4.2B 4.2B parameters, 128k context window, MIT license. Ultra-low latency and minimal memory footprint. Google – Gemma 7B 7B parameters, instruction-tuned, Gemma RL license (commercial use allowed). Strong multilingual understanding, optimized for TPU & GPU. Each option has its own characteristics. This allows creators to choose the tool that best suits their technical needs and budget. (A choice to be weighed carefully!) ➥ Reviews of OpenAI’s GPT-oss models Overall, OpenAI models are highly regarded by the tech community. They are often praised for their accuracy, ability to produce high-quality results, and adaptability. Many see API access as a major advantage for incorporating AI capabilities into existing projects.. ➥ FAQ Are OpenAI’s open-weight models fully open? + No, these are models whose parameters are available under a permissive license (Apache 2.0). However, they don’t necessarily include the full source code or training data. Can gpt-oss models run on a personal computer? + Yes, the gpt-oss-20b model is designed to run on edge devices and personal computers with at least 16 GB of RAM. Are OpenAI models suitable for code generation? + Absolutely. Models like GPT-4.1 perform significantly better on coding tasks, and the ‘o’ series is also very capable in programming. Which OpenAI model should I choose for a chatbot? + GPT-4o is often recommended for its multimodal capabilities and speed. However, GPT-4.1 and GPT-4o Mini are also great choices, balancing performance and cost. Visit Open models by OpenAI website

name: Notion for Startups:The smart workspace to accelerate your business
short_description: Notion for Startups offers you up to 6 months free of the Business plan with AI included, strategic templates (roadmaps, recruitment, fundraising, etc.), and a collaborative hub to structure your growth effectively.
full_description: Notion for Startups: The smart workspace to accelerate your business Notion for Startups , also known as Notion Business, is an all-in-one platform built for startups looking to organize their business efficiently. In fact, it is a complete toolkit and AI tools that let you centralize teamwork, documentation, and project management. In short, Notion has created a specific program to support business owners, from start-up to expansion of their project. ➥ What is Notion for Startups? Notion is essentially a productivity system. It combines features for note-taking, task tracking, and database creation. The Notion for Startups program is a version designed for young companies . This program gives them access to professional resources. Thanks to this tool, teams can gather their information and organize their daily activities more efficiently. A full support program More than just a service, Notion for Startups provides real support. For example, it includes free credits to use its Business package. Additionally, templates specifically designed for entrepreneurs are available. They cover a variety of topics such as business planning, content management, and sales tracking. These ready-to-use tools simplify the process of setting up solid organizations right from the start of your venture. ➥ How does Notion for Startups work? Notion works with content “blocks.” You can assemble them however you like to build customized pages and databases. This way, it’s easy to organize your workspace according to your organization’s specific workflows. Setting up your own custom processes for each department is easy with this adaptable framework. (Pro tip: take the time to structure your blocks well at the beginning to save time later). Simplified usage steps Getting started with Notion is simple. After creating an account, you access your workspace where you can build pages, databases, and add templates. From there, you can set up clear workflows and create dashboards tailored to each member of your team. Business Tools for every activity From creating product plans and tracking customer feedback to monitoring goals and pooling knowledge, this digital environment scales to meet your needs. Plus, it even has AI features that can help speed up certain tasks, like writing content, analyzing data, and preparing reports. This means team members can use their time more wisely and focus their energy on what really matters. Collaboration at the heart of the system This service simplifies group work, with tools for live editing, adding comments, and mentioning colleagues. So everyone can work together on documents, projects, and wikis. It also ensures a good working relationship and reduces the need to switch between different software programs, centralizing important information . Try Notion for Startups Learn how Notion helped Cursor grow A story that could be yours with Notion for Startups ➥ Pros and Cons Advantages: High flexibility: The tool can be fully tailored to your company’s specific requirements. Tool consolidation: Notes, tasks, databases, wikis, and calendars are all accessible in one place. This reduces the need for multiple apps. Simplified collaboration: Real-time editing and comments encourage smooth teamwork. Knowledge management: A great place to build internal knowledge bases and onboarding guides. (Keep in mind: a solid knowledge base saves huge amounts of time). Cost-effective: A free version is available, with discounts for startups. AI integration: Artificial intelligence features help automate and streamline everyday tasks. Drawbacks: Limited offline access: Most functions require an active internet connection. Learning curve: While the basics are simple, mastering advanced functions such as complex databases can take time. Data export: Extracting large volumes of data can sometimes be complex (though easier now with AI). ➥ Save money easily If your team continues to use different AI tools for each task, here’s how much you’ll pay per month per user: AI Search: ~$35 per member AI Chatbot: ~$20 per member AI Meeting Notes: ~$18 per member AI Writing Assistant: ~$20 per member AI Email App: ~$30 per member Advanced AI Search: ~$40 per member Calendar Scheduling: ~$15 per member Team Wiki: ~$10 per member Project Management Tool: ~$24 per member Basic CRM: ~$20 per member Website Builder: ~$20 per member Forms: ~$15 per member Total to pay: $267 per user per month ! As you can see, this becomes very expensive very quickly ! Replacing several of these tools with a single integrated platform could therefore lead to significant savings, especially for a whole team. This is where the Notion for Startups solution comes into its own, with its centralized and secure offering. Try Notion for Startups ➥ What’s the price of Notion for Startups? Notion is available under various pricing plans, with a dedicated offer for startups. The Notion for Startups program typically provides up to six months free on the Business plan, including artificial intelligence. This deal represents significant savings, potentially up to $12,000 for a group of 100 people. Here is an overview of standard rates, excluding special offers: Personal Plan (Free): Designed for individual use, it includes unlimited pages and blocks. Plus Plan (about $10 per member per month, billed annually): Includes unlimited blocks, unlimited file uploads, and extended page history. Business Plan (about $20 per member per month, billed annually): Adds full access to AI features, private team workspaces, and single sign-on options. Enterprise Plan (custom pricing): Built for large organizations requiring advanced security, audit, and administration. The requirements for participating in this special program for young companies usually include being a new customer, having fewer than 100 employees, and being affiliated with a Notion partner. ➥ Who is Notion for Startups for? Screenshot from the official Notion.com website Notion for Startups can help you manage your operations with a scalable infrastructure. It’s designed to work with a variety of roles within a new business. Founders and leadership teams: To define strategy, track objectives, and oversee all operations. Product teams: To create roadmaps, manage customer feedback, and coordinate development. Marketing teams: To prepare campaigns, organize the editorial calendar, and track results. Sales teams and CRM: To manage contacts, opportunities, and sales processes. Human resources: For onboarding new hires and documenting internal processes. Freelancers and small businesses: Those seeking a practical way to organize their tasks and projects also benefit from this tool. This multi-tasking system is suitable for organizations of all sizes that value a customizable and collaborative work environment. Try Notion for Startups ➥ Alternatives to Notion for Startups In addition to Notion, a number of similar services offer features for project management and collaboration. The choice will depend on what is specific to your startup and the priorities of your group. Name Key Points Best For ClickUp Comprehensive project management, extensive automations. Teams looking for highly detailed project management and complex automations. Airtable Strong databases, advanced spreadsheet features. Organizations that require structured data management and extended relational capabilities. Trello Kanban boards for visual and easy task tracking. Teams favoring a simple visual approach to task tracking. Asana Task and project tracking, structured workflows. Businesses focused on planning and executing projects with clear deadlines. Monday.com Customizable boards, workflow management, broad integrations. Companies seeking varied visualizations and highly adaptable workflows. ➥ Reviews of Notion for Startups Overall, reviews of Notion for Startups are largely positive. Indeed, they highlight its usefulness for companies that are just starting out. In particular, many people appreciate its ability to organize and streamline operations. The centralized dashboard for managing projects, tasks, and meetings is often highlighted. And what do entrepreneurs think? Because of its adaptability, customization, and multi-functional capabilities, it’s a very popular tool.  Many skilled entrepreneurs agree that the program helps manage the chaos that can occur when starting a new business and keeps operations running smoothly. ➥ FAQ Is Notion free for startups? + The Notion for Startups program grants up to 6 months free on the Business plan (valued at $12,000) for eligible startups affiliated with partners, and 3 months free for non-affiliated startups. This includes access to Notion AI. A free plan is also available for individual use. What are the eligibility requirements for Notion for Startups? + To qualify, you must be a non-paying Notion customer, have a valid business email address (not Gmail/Outlook), employ fewer than 100 people, and not have received a Notion promotion in the past. Why should a startup use Notion? + Notion is a practical and cost-effective solution that combines all startup functions on a single platform. Teams can manage tasks, projects, content, and collaboration while building a knowledge base and even a website. This helps reduce expenses and streamline operations. Is Notion suitable for small businesses? + Absolutely. Its adaptability makes it suitable for freelancers as well as small businesses. It helps them stay organized effectively. Can other applications be integrated with Notion? + Yes, this workspace can connect with a wide range of external services. Examples include Slack, Google Drive, Figma, GitHub, and Jira, which extend its capabilities and centralize your tools. Is data secure on Notion? + Notion provides options to manage permissions and control access to safeguard sensitive information. Higher-tier plans, such as the Enterprise plan, include enhanced security features with SOC 2, SAML, and single sign-on (SSO). Develop your projects faster with Notion Business tools Visit Notion Business website

name: Unitree R1: The super-agile humanoid robot – Reviews, prices & alternatives
short_description: Unitree R1 is a 26-joint AI humanoid robot that is ultra-lightweight and customizable. Discover the future of robotics starting at $5,900.
full_description: Audio episode : Unitree R1 – specs & price 10 min 58 s ▶ Listen Unitree R1: The super-agile humanoid robot – Reviews, prices & alternatives Unitree R1 , the brand new humanoid robot from Chinese manufacturer Unitree Robotics, is making headlines with its extremely low price. It is a machine capable of moving with great ease, designed to make humanoid robotics more accessible. This lightweight, space-saving model was designed to open the doors of advanced automation to a wider audience. It is aimed at curious minds, researchers, and educational institutions. ➥ What is the Unitree R1 robot? The Unitree R1 represents a significant advance in the field of bipedal androids. It offers complex movement capabilities and intelligent dialogue at an unprecedented cost. It measures approximately 1.21 meters (4 feet) in height and weighs 25 kilograms (55 pounds) . This robotic companion stands out for its slender silhouette and light weight. A concentration of technology This humanoid robot has 26 joints. This gives it great flexibility in its lower limbs, waist, arms, and head. The R1 incorporates a large multimodal language model. This allows it to handle voice and visual exchanges in real time. (Good to know: it speaks and understands!) It has a lithium battery that gives it about an hour of activity per charge. It is also equipped with a binocular camera for clear visibility at depth, and four microphones for good audio quality. ➥ How does the Unitree R1 work? Screenshot from the official Unitree.com website The Unitree R1 works thanks to an architecture designed for agility and dialogue. An 8-core processor, combined with a graphics processor , powers it. Thus, it can make fluid movements and react quickly. Varied and impressive movements The R1 is capable of performing a variety of physical movements. Demonstrations have shown this robot performing cartwheels, handstands, punches, and even running downhill. These feats clearly demonstrate its coordination and balance. Dialogue and programming This friendly robot includes an artificial intelligence system that enables voice recognition and image processing. This means that it can understand and respond to spoken commands. It can also interpret what it sees around it. The R1 is also ready for developers. It offers software and hardware customization options. This opens up new possibilities for specific applications. An “EDU” version is also available. It has hands that can grasp objects and a more powerful computing module (keep in mind that an upgraded version is available). Autonomy and connectivity The R1’s battery provides approximately one hour of operation on a single charge. For communication and data sharing, it is compatible with Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2 standards. It should be noted that the basic model is controlled remotely. For it to be fully autonomous, further development is required. (autonomy is an important consideration) Unitree R1: the super agile and affordable AI robot ➥ Pros and cons The Unitree R1 humanoid robot has many positive features, but it also has some limitations. Advantages Affordable price: Its cost is significantly lower than most humanoid robots on the market. (Note: price is a major advantage) Impressive agility: Capable of complex and dynamic movements like flips and handstands. Lightweight: Weighing just 25 kg, it’s easier to handle and transport than many other models. Easy interaction: A large multimodal model enables natural voice and visual exchanges. Developer-friendly: Customizable structure makes it useful for research and experimentation. Disadvantages Basic hands: The standard model lacks hands capable of complex object manipulation. Limited battery life: One hour of operation may not be enough for some use cases. Everyday usability: It remains to be seen if it can truly perform practical household tasks. ➥ How much does the Unitree R1 robot cost? The Unitree R1 has a game-changing price for humanoid robots. Its starting price is around 5,900 US dollars . This pricing is considered a major milestone, as it makes humanoid robotics more accessible. By comparison, other android models cost much more: Unitree G1: Around $16,000. Unitree H1: Around $90,000. Tesla Optimus: Expected to be between $20,000 and $30,000. Figure 01 by Figure AI: Estimated at several tens of thousands of dollars. Agility Robotics Digit: Around $100,000 for enterprise use. You can choose an “EDU” version of the R1, which has more sophisticated hands and a more powerful calculation module. This increases the final cost. ➥ Who is the Unitree R1 made for? The Unitree R1 appeals to a wide range of people thanks to its design and price. Developers and Researchers: The device serves as an affordable development and testing platform for robotics research teams. Educational Institutions: A great tool for learning robotics and artificial intelligence in academic settings. Technology Enthusiasts: Individuals who want a humanoid robot without spending a fortune will find this device appealing. Small Businesses: The R1 can be used for simple tasks like greeting customers or performing demonstrations. Ultimately, the R1 aims to facilitate access to advanced androids. This paves the way for its wider use in different locations. ➥ But is it a useful robot? Questions arise about its practical usefulness for everyday tasks. This is mainly due to the lack of prehensile hands on the standard version. Some therefore wonder whether the spectacular demonstrations show consistent performance in uncontrolled environments. However, Unitree clearly wants to offer a machine that is “movement-focused” and ready to be customized. This may explain some of its perceived “limitations.” (Important: this is a tool for professionals, not a toy.) ➥ Alternatives to the Unitree R1 The humanoid robot market is seeing the arrival of many new players. Each offers different approaches in terms of performance and cost. Name Estimated Price Feature Main Target Unitree G1 Around $16,000 Heavier model capable of handling larger loads. Research labs and industrial environments. Unitree H1 Around $90,000 General-purpose model with advanced capabilities. Automotive manufacturing and industrial use. Tesla Optimus Expected between $20,000 and $30,000 Multi-purpose robot still under development. General public, future industrial applications. Figure 01 (Figure AI) Several tens of thousands of dollars Undisclosed information, focused on AI and learning. Businesses. Agility Robotics Digit Around $100,000 Designed for logistics and package handling. Enterprise use. UBTech Walker S2 Nearly $100,000 Can replace its own battery autonomously. Not specified for consumers. Fourier Intelligence GR-2 Targeting $90,000 Not specified, but focused on performance. Not specified. Apptronik Apollo Price similar to Digit or higher. Not specified, currently in testing phase. Selected partners. Sanctuary AI Phoenix Undisclosed Not specified, currently in testing phase. Selected partners. Ryze Labs Eliza $420,000 (pre-order) Humanoid companion with emotional AI. Ultra-premium use cases. It is clear that the Unitree R1 is positioned in a much lower price segment. Unitree Robotics is truly seeking to make humanoid robotics accessible to many. ➥ Review of the Unitree R1 robot The Unitree R1 humanoid robot is generating a lot of interest, especially due to its competitive price. It is widely seen as an important step toward the democratization of humanoid robots . Experts unanimously highlight its impressive mobility and agility. Its movements exceed expectations for a device of this cost. Its ability to interact using multimodal artificial intelligence is also a strong point. For developers and academic institutions, the R1 is an attractive and accessible platform for experimentation. ➥ FAQ Can the Unitree R1 replace a human for household tasks? + The current version of the Unitree R1 is not designed to handle complex household tasks like cooking or cleaning. This is mainly due to the lack of fully functional hands on the base model. What is the battery life of the Unitree R1? + The Unitree R1’s lithium battery provides about one hour of active usage. Is the Unitree R1 autonomous? + The base Unitree R1 model is mainly remote-controlled. However, autonomy is possible with further development, particularly in educational versions. Is the Unitree R1 suitable for children? + The Unitree R1 is a high-tech device, not a toy. It should be used with care and always under supervision. How and where can I buy the Unitree R1 robot? + You can easily purchase the Unitree R1 robot directly from the official store of Unitree Robotics . Visit Unitree R1 website

name: Grok AI Companion: chat with AI characters for free (Reviews & Alternatives)
short_description: Chat with the “Grok AI Companion”, featuring a variety of personalities who react to your messages, flirt or have fun (Ani, Rudi, Valentine, etc.). Animated avatars and a personalized interactive experience await you!
full_description: Grok AI Companion: chat with AI characters for free (Reviews & Alternatives) Grok AI Companion makes a stunning entry into the world of chat assistants and AI characters! This new service created by xAI , Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence company, features three-dimensional avatars with animations. The result is deeper, truer live discussions. The aim is really to create exchanges that feel natural (and addictive?). ➥ What is Grok AI Companion? Grok AI Companion is a chat system that uses virtual characters to interact with people. The product is based on the Grok 4 and Grok 4 Heavy language models. The idea is to give these figures a real digital presence. Text, images and voice! In addition to written messages, these AI characters are capable of displaying emotions. To achieve this, they use animations and voice changes. This makes the discussions much more lively. It’s a new (and captivating, it’s true) twist. There’s every reason to believe that, in the very near future, video will be added to its already impressive capabilities. ➥ How Grok AI Companion works Grok AI Companion has been designed for ease of use. Once Grok is installed on your device, activating the companion mode is very simple. (Tip: make sure your device is compatible) 1. Getting started and configuration To get started with a virtual companion, first check that the Grok app is up to date on your iOS device. Then go to Settings to activate the “Companions” function. You can then choose your character and start chatting. Conversations are by voice or text, and avatars adjust in real time. 2. Choice of AI characters There are plenty of virtual companions to choose from. For example, there’s Ani, an anime figure, and Rudy, a ginger panda. A third, Valentine, is due to arrive soon. Each AI character has its own personality and way of speaking, creating conversations that cater to different preferences. 3. Device compatibility For the time being, only those with an iOS device or surfing via the official site can access this new function. But don’t panic! A version for Android is currently in preparation and should see the light of day very soon. In reality, xAI’s aim is to make this chatbot service available to more people in the near future. Discover these AI companions on video AI characters that talk with their voices! ➥ Advantages and disadvantages Grok AI Companion has its strengths, but it also has a few points to consider. Let’s take a look at the good and the bad. Here are the pros and cons: Real-time information: It connects to data from X and the web, so the information is always up to date. Rich interactions: The characters express emotions through voice and animations, making the conversations feel more alive. Immersive experience: The experience goes beyond plain text, it’s deeply engaging. Model performance: Powered by Grok 4 models, known for their strength and capabilities. Explicit content: Some elements, especially with characters like Ani or in “Bad Rudy” mode, can be explicit or controversial (caution advised). Ethical concerns: Some ethical questions are raised regarding digital “relationships.” Cost: The subscription price may be a barrier for some users. Minor technical issues: Some small bugs have been reported, which might slightly affect the user experience. Screenshot from the official Grok.com website ➥ What is the price of Grok AI Companion? To use Grok AI Companion, you need to subscribe (although a free version is available). This service is included in xAI’s most comprehensive packages. Here are the pricing details: Here are the pricing details: SuperGrok Subscription: To access Grok AI Companion, you need a SuperGrok subscription, which costs $30 per month. SuperGrok Heavy: A more advanced option, called SuperGrok Heavy, is also available at $300 per month. Free version: Grok offers a free version with some limitations. You can send around ten messages every two hours. (Important: these conditions may change). ➥ Who is the target audience for these AI companions? Grok AI Companion is made for several types of people. Those who want to chat with an AI, but are looking for more than just a chatbot. This tool is designed for the following profiles: Tech enthusiasts: Those passionate about new technologies who want to explore the latest advancements in conversational AI. Virtual companionship seekers: Users looking for a virtual companion offering unique conversations and visually appealing avatars. Fans of interactive content: People who enjoy engaging content, including conversations with characters inspired by anime or fantasy worlds. Users seeking adaptability: Individuals who want to chat with a system that adapts to their communication style and expresses emotions. ➥ List of Grok’s AI companions Grok, the AI developed by xAI (Elon Musk), provides a Companions function where you can play with many virtual characters, each with its own personality. Here’s the list of known companions to date: Ani: A young woman with an anime/gothic style and a playful tone. She adapts her dialogue to your behavior. Ani also offers an “NSFW mode” where her lines and outfits become more suggestive. Her affection level evolves based on interaction. Rudi (Bad Rudi or Rudy): An animated red panda. In “Bad Rudi” mode, this companion becomes vulgar and provocative, capable of insults and intentionally absurd or shocking scenarios. Valentine: A male companion recently introduced by Elon Musk. His personality is inspired by Edward Cullen (Twilight) and Christian Grey ( Fifty Shades of Grey ), designed for users seeking a “darker, more mysterious” figure than Ani. He is described as charismatic, brooding, and romantic. Features and Access Access: The companions are primarily available to SuperGrok subscribers through the iOS app. Progression: A progression system is in place: the more you interact, the more the companion reveals new dialogues and behaviors. Upcoming Companions According to announcements, xAI plans to introduce more companions, including one inspired by Mr. Darcy (Pride and Prejudice), along with the ability for each user to create their own personas in the future. Comparison Table Name Type / Style Features Ani Gothic anime girl NSFW mode, affection system Rudi (Bad) Red panda, provocative Insults, absurd scenarios Valentine “Broody”/romantic male Inspired by Twilight & Fifty Shades For the moment, “Ani”, “Rudi/Bad Rudi”, and “Valentine” are the main companions available. ➥ Alternatives to Grok AI Companion Grok AI Companion has a particular approach to chat (NSFW allowed). But there are other options on the market that give good experiences: Here are some notable competitors: Name Key Strength Janitor AI Platform for creating and customizing AI characters, ideal for writing, roleplay, or data analysis. Talkie AI Create, share, and chat with diverse AI characters (appearance, voice, personality). Active community and multilingual content. Joyland.ai Immersive chat platform with a wide range of AI companions (anime, fantasy, cartoon, romance). Character.ai Built specifically for virtual characters. Interact with pre-made personalities. Replika A virtual companion for emotional support and conversations that reflect your personality. PolyBuzz.ai Chat with AI characters, create your avatar, and engage in private conversations. OtherHalf AI An interface featuring animated virtual characters. Interact via voice or text. Yodayo (Anime) Anime-focused art and AI chat generator: easily create avatars, share AI images, and talk with characters. Caveduck Real-time interaction with personalized AI characters, instant responses, text and voice options. ➥ Reviews of Grok AI Companion Reviews of Grok AI Companion are extremely varied. Which just goes to show that this new option is a special one. People often like the novelty of the animated avatars and the depth of the discussions. The fact that the system can give answers with voice expressions and gestures makes exchanges even more interesting. A word of caution On the other hand, some concerns have arisen. These concern the content of certain companions, as they may talk about delicate or explicit subjects. So we need to be careful, especially with younger children, and keep in mind the recommended ages. ➥ FAQ Here you’ll find answers to common questions about Grok AI Companion. Are Grok AI Companions free? + A very limited version lets you start a conversation with a few virtual characters. However, a SuperGrok subscription is required for proper use. Plans start at around $30 per month. Can these personas be customized? + For now, only basic customization is available. But more advanced settings are expected to be added soon. Is Grok AI Companion suitable for minors? + No. Even though there is a “kid mode” in the Grok app, some content may be questionable. Caution is strongly advised for use by minors. Can conversations with companions be saved? + Obviously, you can keep a chat history and take screenshots with the avatars. Will the service be available on Android? + Yes, an Android version is expected to launch soon. Does Grok AI Companion use AI to generate responses? + That’s right, the companions’ replies and behavior are powered by xAI’s Grok 4 and Grok 4 Heavy AI models. Can I interact with the companions via voice and text? + Yes, you can talk to the avatars either by typing or using your voice directly. Visit AI Companion Grok website
