name: Reachy Mini: the open-source desktop AI robot (Review & Price)
short_description: Discover Reachy Mini, the open-source humanoid AI robot from Pollen Robotics and Hugging Face. Ideal for AI, research and robotics education.
full_description: Reachy Mini: the open-source desktop AI robot (Review & Price) Reachy Mini , a creation of Pollen Robotics (supported by Hugging Face), embodies a milestone for robotics in the home. It’s a small desktop robot, easy to obtain and open to all, made to discover the relationship between man and machine, as well as the development of artificial intelligence, all from your desk. The idea behind it is to make humanoid robotics more accessible and fun for everyone. ➥ What is Reachy Mini? Reachy Mini is a small humanoid robot designed to sit easily on a desk. It’s an entirely open source project , from the parts to the software that runs it. This encourages people to make it their own and modify it as they see fit. Reachy Mini technical specifications This little robot stands out in several respects. Measuring around 28 centimetres in height and weighing in at 1.5 kilograms , it’s easy to handle. What’s more, its head moves on six axes, making it expressive. His body rotates completely, and his antennae are animated, to give him even more personality. Two models available For communication, Reachy Mini features a wide-angle camera , microphones and a 5W speaker. There are two models: the “Lite” version plugs into a computer, and the “Wireless” version includes a Raspberry Pi 5, Wi-Fi and a battery to walk alone for longer. (Be sure to choose your version according to your use). ➥ How to animate Reachy Mini? Getting to grips with Reachy Mini is pretty straightforward, especially for those who want to get started with AI robotics. The robot comes in kit form. The idea is to assemble it yourself, which gives you a good understanding of how it works inside. Getting started with programming To program this mini robot, we mainly use Python, a very popular and easy-to-learn code language. In the future, JavaScript and Scratch will also be available, making it even easier for beginners and younger users. The robot connects directly to the Hugging Face Hub . It’s a large repository filled with AI models and datasets. Thanks to this, complex programs can be created for the robot’s voice, vision or even way of being. What’s more, some 15 gestures are ready to go, so you can start using it right away. Community sharing and simulation Even before you’ve got the robot in hand, you can start working with a special simulator. It’s really handy for trying out and improving your projects without needing the real robot. 100% open-source ! What’s more, because Reachy Mini is entirely open source, it encourages people to work together. We invite you to share what you create, and to use programs that other people have made all over the world. (Tip: take advantage of the community!). Reachy Mini in video Reachy Mini: the open-source AI robot ➥ Advantages and limitations An Open Source robot Reachy Mini has a number of advantages, for beginners and robotics specialists alike. Its “open source” nature, for both hardware and software, means there’s plenty of scope for modification and research. In addition, its small size is a real plus, as it fits on any desk and is easy to transport. An attractive price Its affordable price makes it far more accessible than most other AI robots designed for research or education. Intelligent integration with Hugging Face Finally, its seamless integration with the Hugging Face ecosystem greatly simplifies testing with high-performance AI models (its Hugging Face integration is a major strength). To be considered Even so, Reachy Mini has a few limitations. It’s designed as a desktop robot, so it has no legs or wheels. So it stays in a fixed place. Some also wonder whether interest in this device will last long for people who use it only occasionally. ➥ How much does Reachy Mini cost? Reachy Mini is available at a very attractive price. It comes in two models to suit a variety of needs and budgets. Reachy Mini Lite: priced at $299 (excluding taxes and shipping). This model must be connected to a computer. Reachy Mini (Wireless): priced at $449 (excluding taxes and shipping). This version runs independently, with its own Raspberry Pi 5 , wireless connectivity, and built-in battery. Deliveries of the Lite model will begin in late summer 2025. Deliveries of the Wireless version will run from autumn 2025 to 2026. ➥ For whom is Reachy Mini ideal? Screenshot from the official Huggingface.com website This desktop robot has been designed for a wide range of users, from DIY fans to professionals. AI developers and researchers: This is a great tool for prototyping conversational agents and visual interactions, using Hugging Face’s AI models. Educators and students: Its kit-based design and support for beginner-friendly coding languages make it a strong learning tool for robotics and AI. Creators and hobbyists: Perfect for those who enjoy hands-on robotics and want to explore AI behavior in a fun and practical way. Businesses: This robot is ideal for quickly testing complex AI workflows (multimodal pipelines) and building early-stage AI-powered solutions. ➥ Alternatives to Reachy Mini Robot / Kit Price Features Links Educational robotics kits (e.g. certain LEGO Mindstorms) Varies Modular assembly, visual programming LEGO Mindstorms Programmable desktop robots (e.g. Misty II) More expensive Autonomous features, software extensions Misty II Small open-source robots (VEX) Varies Collaborative design, research-oriented VEX V5 ➥ Review of Reachy Mini Preliminary reviews of Reachy Mini are mostly favorable. Particularly appreciated is its ease of access and open approach. The community salutes the initiative to simplify robotics, by making testing with physical AI cheaper and simpler. Some emphasize its potential for creating programs that enable dialogue and are useful for learning. Others wonder about the diversity of possible uses, beyond the first demonstrations. Whatever the case, the general enthusiasm stems from the promise of being able to interact with artificial intelligence in a more concrete way. ➥ FAQ Can Reachy Mini move? + No, Reachy Mini is designed as a desktop robot. It has no legs or wheels. Its only possible movements are the rotation of its head, body, and antennas. Is it difficult to assemble Reachy Mini? + Reachy Mini comes as a kit, so you need to assemble it yourself. The goal is to help you understand how it’s built, and it’s not too complicated. Which programming languages are supported? + Currently, Reachy Mini can be fully programmed with Python. Support for JavaScript and Scratch is planned soon. Visit Reachy Mini website

name: Kimi K2 : the Best Free Agentic AI Model – Reviews, Prices & Alternatives
short_description: Meet Kimi K2 from Moonshot AI, a free open source MoE model with 1T parameters. Optimized for agentic AI, coding and reasoning. Exceeds proprietary SOTA.
full_description: Kimi K2 : the Best Free Agentic AI Model – Reviews, Prices & Alternatives Kimi K2 , a creation of Moonshot AI, is a game-changing large open-source language model for artificial intelligence. It’s a high-level AI model for agentic tasks, coding and complex reasoning. It is claimed to be better than AIs such as Claude . ➥ What is Kimi K2? Kimi K2 is a new language model from the laboratories of Moonshot AI , a Chinese company renowned for its success. It is based on a MoE (Mixture-of-Experts) architecture that accumulates a total of one trillion parameters, 32 billion of which are active on each pass. This architecture makes it possible to manage workloads efficiently, by directing resources to the tasks that count. Moreover, it is distributed in the form of “open weights”, which facilitates experimentation and deployment by a large number of people. Technical features Kimi K2’s MoE architecture selects eight experts per token, plus a shared expert for general context. This process helps the system to optimize its calculations, for accurate, nuanced results. To ensure that training remains stable on such a large scale, Moonshot AI has created the MuonClip optimizer. This is an important technical point, as it prevents the usual worries of very large models, such as problems with attention values drifting away. A large contextual window Kimi K2 has a 128,000 token contextual window , enabling it to process and analyze large amounts of information at once. Unlike conventional conversation systems, this model is designed for agentic intelligence. Here, AI doesn’t just respond; it acts to achieve specific goals, using tools and managing complex processes. (This ability to act concretely is a major strength). Impressive Benchmark Results Screenshot from the official website Kimi.com ➥ How does Kimi K2 work? Kimi K2 has been trained on millions of dialogues designed to simulate exchanges with various tools. This gives him the ability to divide tasks, use tools in an orderly fashion, write and correct code, and coordinate work processes. It moves from reasoning to action without the need for human intervention all the time. Common situations of use Kimi K2 can be used in a number of areas. Developers use it, for example, for automatic code execution, to make complete web applications or to analyze data with graphs. The system can also handle over 17 tools per session, all without the need for additional plug-ins. (imagine the time savings for your projects) An interesting AI for code Furthermore, Kimi K2 integrates well with well-known development tools such as VS Code , thanks to extensions such as Cline and RooCode. This compatibility makes it easy to use for code tasks and exchanges with software agents. Watch Kimi K2 in action! Kimi K2: a (very) powerful “Moe” model using AI agents ➥ Strengths and limitations This model has many strengths, but also some limitations that are worth knowing. Strong performance: The model performs very well in code evaluations (LiveCodeBench, SWE-bench), reasoning, and tool usage. It is often better than competitors like GPT-4.1 and Claude Sonnet 4. Affordable cost: Its token price is much lower than that of several major proprietary models, which makes it attractive for budgeting. Open Source: The model’s “open weights” make testing, downloading, and local usage easier. This contrasts with systems that are often closed. Agentic capabilities: It is designed for autonomous action and tool handling, which is a major step forward. Large context window: It can process 128,000 tokens at the same time, which is an advantage for tasks that require strong understanding of long documents. No visual understanding: The current Kimi K2 model does not handle images or visual elements. Main interface in Chinese: The official chat interface of Moonshot AI is mainly in Chinese, so translation tools are required for those who do not speak the language. A user account is also required. (important note for non-Chinese speakers) Different performance on public demos: Using the model on shared platforms like Hugging Face Spaces can sometimes cause slowness. Specific license for large commercial uses: Even though the weights are open (and therefore free), a clause requires the name “Kimi K2” to be shown on commercial products that reach important thresholds of users or revenue. ➥ What is the price of Kimi K2? Cost-wise, this is obviously a (very) attractive option. For API calls, the cost is around $0.60 per million input tokens (if the cache is not used) and $2.50 per million output tokens . Bear in mind that this is a small fraction of the cost of many competing models. How to try Kimi K2 for free? Despite these API rates, you can use Kimi K2 without paying . You can access it for free via Moonshot AI’s official chat interface, with a simple login. In addition, demos are often offered on platforms such as Hugging Face Spaces, enabling testing at no direct cost, although speed may change. ➥ Who is Kimi K2 designed for? This AI model has been created for different types of users. Here are a few examples: Developers and researchers: The Kimi-K2-Base version, the base model, is well suited for customization and fine-tuning for targeted projects. Teams seeking tailored solutions: Those who aim to build AI systems adapted to specific situations will find a solid foundation with this model. Those who use AI for standard and agentic tasks: The Kimi-K2-Instruct version is ready to use for conversations and applications that require performing tasks independently. Businesses: Organizations that focus on complex code and automated process management will benefit greatly from Kimi K2’s capabilities. For those seeking efficient and low-cost AI: Its combination of high performance and low cost makes it a wise choice for managing expenses. ➥ Alternatives to Kimi K2 Model Name Price (per 1M tokens, input/output) Feature Kimi K2 (Moonshot AI) $0.60 (input) / $2.50 (output) Agentic intelligence, coding, long context window. GPT-4.1 (OpenAI) $2.00 (input) / $8.00 (output) Smart model for complex tasks, wide range of applications. Claude Sonnet 4 (Anthropic) $3.00 (input) / $15.00 (output) Linguistic reasoning, advanced contextualization. Gemini 2.5 Pro (Google) $2.50 (input) / $15.00 (output) Multimodality, balanced performance across various tasks. DeepSeek-V3 (DeepSeek AI) $0.27 (input) / $1.10 (output) Conversational focus, competitive pricing. Qwen3 (Alibaba Cloud) $0.20 (input) / $0.60 (output) High reasoning performance, multilingual, AI agents. ➥ Reviews of Kimi K2 Feedback on Kimi K2 is pretty good . The system is well regarded for what it does in benchmark tests, especially for code and agentic problem solving. Experts in the field are positive that it can do as well as, or better than, well-known proprietary models. Its “open weight” approach (open-source and free), as well as the affordable price of its API, are also frequently cited advantages. ➥ FAQ Is Kimi K2 free? + Yes, Kimi K2 can be used without paying through the official chat interface of Moonshot AI, but a login is required. In addition, its “open weights” help developers test it and run it on their own machine. However, API access is paid. What are the main uses of Kimi K2? + Without a doubt, it is very good for AI agent tasks, code, complex reasoning, and even tool usage. It is designed to break down difficult problems and take action to solve them. Who created Kimi K2? + Kimi K2 comes from Moonshot AI, a young Chinese company working in artificial intelligence, founded in 2023 by Yang Zhilin. Does Kimi K2 support visual understanding? + No, this model does not yet include vision capabilities. It currently focuses on language processing and agentic features. Visit Kimi K2 website

name: Grok 4: The new XAI’s AI model, an AGI? Reviews, Prices & Alternatives
short_description: The latest high-performance LLM model from xAI, specialized in reasoning and logic(AGI?). This AI has obtained record results in academic and mathematical tests. Multi-agent version takes on the hardest challenges.
full_description: Audio episode : Grok 4 – strengths & limits 12 min 44 s ▶ Listen Grok 4: The new XAI’s AI model, an AGI? Reviews, Prices & Alternatives Grok 4 , xAI’s latest creation, has crushed all the latest AI benchmarks. It is without doubt the best artificial intelligence available today. This model, designed by Elon Musk’s company, is helping to change our approach to knowledge and logic. It appears as a truth-seeking AI companion equipped to provide direct answers and a pronounced curiosity. ➥ What is Grok 4? Screenshot from the official Grok.com website In fact, Grok 4 is the latest flagship version of the great language models developed by xAI. This model is bluntly presented with “doctorate-level” intelligence, surpassing even many graduates in various disciplines. Officially launched on July 9 and 10, 2025, this instrument represents a major breakthrough in the area of generative AI. Versions available, including the famous “Heavy” version xAI’s new baby comes in two main variants: a standard version and “ Grok 4 Heavy ”, a multi-agent version designed for even more complex queries. A specialized edition, Grok 4 Code, is also available for developers. Architecture designed for performance (+API) Grok 4’s core is based on its improved reasoning capabilities and logic based on first principles. Such a feature enables it to correct its own errors and provide accurate answers. The extended contextual window of this model, reaching over 130,000 tokens in the application and up to 256,000 tokens via its programming interface (API). This gives it an in-depth understanding of vast quantities of data, including entire code bases. ➥ How does Grok 4 operate? Its operation integrates several components for the smoothest possible experience. The model is accessible via the X application, the xAI API, and the grok.com website. It has been specially designed to provide intelligent, real-time information thanks to its DeepSearch functionality, which draws directly on up-to-date data from the X social network and the web. Multi-modal skills and remarkable responsiveness Grok 4 supports text input, visual input and image generation, with augmented abilities for image interpretation. Also, its refined voice capabilities ensure natural, soothing interactions. In continuation, a “Heavy” version implements a multi-agent system, where multiple AI agents collaborate to solve hard problems and polish results. A trusted code assistant For development professionals, Grok 4 Code is a valuable aid. This variation facilitates code generation, completion and debugging, with direct integration into integrated development environments (IDEs). You can even submit complete source code files for correction. (Now that’s impressive!) A distinct personality Grok 4 is known for its conversational tone, often infused with humor, which makes the dialogue more engaging. What’s more, it’s also renowned for its ability to provide direct answers, not hesitating to broach subjects that other conversational agents might avoid. However, this approach has generated some controversy in the past, which xAI strives to manage through moderation adjustments. Watch xAI’s official Grok 4 conference (Full) ➥ Grok 4 pros and cons Pros: Top-level thinking, real-time access, multimodal skills, development support, personality and boldness, versatility. Cons: High cost, past controversies, sometimes perfectible common-sense logic, limited transparency of quotes. ➥ What is the price of Grok 4? API (for developers): Input tokens: $3.00 per million tokens. Cached input tokens : 0.75 per million tokens. Output tokens: 15.00 per million tokens. X subscriptions : Basic (Free) : limited access to Grok 3. SuperGrok (~$300 per year) : access to Grok 4 with increased limits and 128,000-token pop-up window. SuperGrok Heavy (~$3,000 per year) : exclusive access to Grok 4 Heavy, technical support and early features. ➥ Who is Grok 4 designed for? Researchers and scientists: PhD-level intelligence and advanced analytical skills. Developers and engineers: Code edition integrated into the IDE. Content creators: text and image generation, real-time data. Enterprises and analysts: megadata analysis and strategic planning. Customer service professionals: relevant, natural answers. Demanding users: performance and direct response. ➥ Grok 4 alternatives Name Price Key Feature ChatGPT Free and paid versions (by OpenAI) Versatile text generation, human-like conversation Google Gemini Free and paid versions (by Google) Multimodal model, advanced reasoning, extended context handling Claude Free and paid versions (by Anthropic) Advanced analysis, in-depth research, AI ethics Perplexity AI Free with premium options Real-time search, information synthesis, verifiable citations Microsoft Copilot Paid, integrated into Microsoft services Enterprise integration, workflow automation Hugging Chat Typically free (open source) Open-source AI experimentation, model customization Meta AI Varies, integrated into Meta apps Social context understanding, creative expression ➥ Reviews of Grok 4, an AGI? Early reactions to Grok 4 have been glowing, with some even calling it AGI (General Artificial Intelligence). This LLM model is considered a powerful tool, prepared to solve questions at a high level and debugging full code bases. It is also superior to existing tools such as Cursor. Reviews also show that it outperforms its direct rivals, such as Claude 4 , Google Gemini 2.5 Pro or OpenAI o3, on several test benches. Review of the AIxploria team At the time of writing, this new model is the best LLM on the market. However, it’s worth mentioning that previous versions of Grok have sparked debate over the unfiltered nature of some of their responses. xAI has taken this feedback on board and is actively working to improve the model’s ability to filter out inappropriate content while retaining its “truth-seeking” aspect. All in all, Grok 4 is a remarkable technical achievement, and continues to improve with each release. We can’t wait to see what’s next with Grok 5! ➥ FAQ Can Grok 4 generate images? + Yes, it supports image generation—a built-in feature that allows users to create visuals from text descriptions. Is Grok 4 free? + No, it’s not entirely free. Limited access to Grok 3 is available at no cost, but full access to Grok 4’s features is available through X premium subscriptions or its API . How does Grok 4 compare to ChatGPT? + Grok 4 aims to be more direct and includes real-time access to data from X and the web. While ChatGPT excels in conversational fluency and creative text generation, Grok 4 also claims superior performance on several benchmark tests compared to competing models. Can Grok 4 be used for programming? + Absolutely. It offers a specialized edition called Grok 4 Code, specifically designed to assist with code generation, completion, and bug fixing. This model is described as fully capable of understanding complex code structures. Visit Grok 4 website

name: Emergent AI: The “Vibe Coding” Platform That Builds Apps While You Sleep?
short_description: Emergent.sh is an AI platform for full-stack site development. Automate planning, coding, testing and deployment. Ideal for Vibe Coding.
full_description: Emergent AI: The “Vibe Coding” Platform That Builds Apps While You Sleep? Ever stared at a blank screen, wishing your dream app could just… appear? Emergent AI might be the tool to make that happen. This isn’t just another code assistant. It’s a full-blown “vibe coding” platform where autonomous agents do the heavy work. Forget syntax errors. Forget weeks of environment setup. Emergent takes your natural language prompts and turns them into deployed, full-stack applications. It claims to replace a traditional dev team with a squad of AI agents . But does it deliver? Let’s find out if this tool lives up to the hype for founders and creators in late 2025. ➥ What Is Emergent AI Exactly? Emergent AI is an agentic development platform. It builds software from scratch using simple text descriptions. Unlike standard coding assistants that autocomplete lines of code, Emergent works more like a project manager and a dev team combined. The core concept here is “vibe coding.” You describe the “vibe” or functionality you want. For example: “a CRM for dog walkers with Stripe payments.” Then, the platform orchestrates multiple AI agents to execute it. One agent plans the architecture. Another writes the Python backend. A third handles the React frontend. A fourth runs tests to squash bugs. In short, it automates the entire software development lifecycle. The result? A product ready to ship, not just snippets of code. ➥ Main Features That Set It Apart Emergent stands out through its multi-agent architecture. Here’s what makes it tick: Multi-Agent Orchestration: Specialized agents collaborate instead of a single model doing everything. A “Planner” breaks down your prompt. A “Coder” writes the syntax. A “Tester” verifies functionality. Full-Stack Generation: It doesn’t just make pretty landing pages. You get real logic: databases, authentication, backend APIs (often Python), and dynamic frontends. Self-Healing Code: If an error pops up during the build, the agents can often detect, debug, and deploy a fix without you noticing. One-Click Deployment: The platform handles hosting. You get a live URL instantly. Connecting custom domains and SSL certificates is easy. Integrations Galore: It supports third-party tools like GitHub, Google Sheets, Supabase, and payment gateways like Stripe right out of the box. Use Cases: From Idea to App So what can you actually build? People are already creating: SaaS MVPs: Quickly validate business ideas like a niche job board or a subscription-based content platform. Internal Tools: Dashboards for tracking inventory or visualizing company data, without bothering the engineering team. Interactive Prototypes: High-fidelity mockups that actually work. Perfect for pitching to investors. Simple Games & Utilities: Fun projects like habit trackers or educational quizzes. ➥ Advantages for the Non-Technical Builder The primary benefit? Speed. What used to take weeks of hiring and management now happens in minutes or hours. You completely bypass the “blank canvas” paralysis. Complex Tech, Made Accessible Another massive plus is the democratization of complex tech . You don’t have to know how to configure a server or write a SQL query. Emergent handles the infrastructure. This means you can focus entirely on product logic and user experience. It empowers solo founders to compete with larger teams. Think of it as a force multiplier for your ambitions. Keep in mind, though: it works best when you guide it. The “vibe coding” approach thrives on iteration. You chat with the bot, refine the design, and tweak features as you go. Have you ever tried building something this way? ➥ Pricing Model: Credits and Tiers Emergent operates on a credit-based system. This is important to understand before you start. Every action consumes credits: planning, coding, fixing. Here’s the current structure: Plan Price Key Inclusions Free $0 / month 10 credits/mo, access to core features, web & mobile building. Great for testing the waters. Standard $20 / month 100 credits/mo, private projects, GitHub integration, ability to buy top-ups. Best for active builders. Pro $200 / month 750 credits/mo, huge context window (1M), custom agents, priority support. For serious power users. Note: Complex debugging loops can burn through credits quickly. The Standard plan is often the sweet spot for anyone serious about finishing a project. ➥ Who Is Emergent AI Best For? This tool is a game-changer for specific profiles. Does one of these sound like you? 1. Non-Technical Founders Do you have domain expertise but lack coding skills? This could be your superpower. You can finally build that platform you’ve been dreaming about. No $50k agency required. 2. Prototypers and Designers Validate concepts fast. Instead of showing static Figma screens, show a working app. It helps you get better feedback and buy-in from stakeholders. 3. Developers in a Rush Even if you know how to code, setting up boilerplate, auth, and database connections is tedious. Emergent handles the boring stuff. You can focus on the logic that matters. ➥ Conclusion: Is It Worth the Hype? Emergent AI represents a significant shift in how we build software. It moves us away from writing syntax and towards “managing” intelligent agents. It isn’t perfect. Sometimes the AI gets stuck in a loop or burns credits on a simple fix. Still, the value proposition is undeniable for speed and accessibility. If you want to turn a fleeting thought into a shareable link by lunchtime, this platform deserves your attention. It creates a space where your ability to describe a solution matters more than your ability to code it. So why not give the free tier a spin? You might surprise yourself with what you can create. Try Emergent AI ➥ Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) Does Emergent AI own the code I generate? + Generally, you own the output. On paid plans, you can often export your code (e.g., to GitHub) and host it elsewhere. This gives you full control over your intellectual property. Can I build mobile apps with it? + Yes! Emergent supports both web applications and mobile-responsive apps. Some updates even mention specific agents optimized for mobile app architecture. What happens if I run out of credits? + On the Free plan, you’ll have to wait for the next month or upgrade. On paid plans like Standard, you can usually purchase “top-up” credits. This way, your development flow isn’t interrupted. Do I have to know code to fix bugs? + Not necessarily. You can paste the error message back into the chat. Or simply tell the agent “the login button isn’t working.” It will attempt to debug the code itself. However, some technical knowledge can help you guide the AI more efficiently. Visit Emergent AI website

name: Cluely: Real-time AI assistant for “cheat at everything”
short_description: Cluely, the undetectable AI for your meetings, interviews and sales. Get coaching, answers and advice in real time. A cheat or just an advantage?
full_description: Cluely: Real-time AI assistant for “cheat at everything” Artificial intelligence is now at the very heart of our professional exchanges. Cluely positions itself as an AI co-pilot capable of analyzing your screens and listening in on your conversations to provide you with instant contextual responses. This AI technology generates as much enthusiasm as controversy in the sales and recruitment sector. ➥ But what is Cluely? In fact, Cluely is an AI assistant, developed by two Columbia students, that runs in the background on your computer (currently Mac & Windows only). It analyzes your screen and listens to your conversations, offering you real-time responses in a discreet window. Some call it an AI cheating tool , but in reality it’s much more than just a cheating tool. Use of powerful LLM models Thanks to OpenAI’s GPT-4o mini and Anthropic’s Claude 4 Sonnet language models, this tool is able to make relevant suggestions that are displayed in a floating window. ➥ How does this conversational AI work? The system works in the background without disrupting your videoconferences (pretty handy when you think about it). It automatically recognizes the context of your exchanges and adapts its recommendations according to the nature of the discussion: job interview, sales negotiation or team meeting. ➥ Key features of the Cluely AI assistant Real-time context analysis Cluely’s artificial intelligence deciphers the nuances of your business conversations (which is no mean feat). In fact, it can distinguish between a customer objection and a technical question, and propose answers adapted to each situation. This contextual analysis is at the heart of the technology developed by founders Chungin Lee and Neel Shanmugam. Discreet and customizable interface The assistance window remains invisible during screen sharing, and can be repositioned to suit your preferences (an important detail). This discretion allows you to maintain your focus on the other person, while benefiting from strategic support. Automatic objection handling The tool is an expert at detecting and handling sales objections . What’s more, it instantly offers counter-arguments, competitive comparisons and rebound techniques to maintain sales momentum (which can make all the difference on a crucial call). ➥ Cluely pricing and subscription plans Three formulas to suit different company profiles: Free plan : Limited access with a few daily answers and the GPT-4.1-mini model (perfect for testing before investing). Ideal for discovering basic capabilities. Pro Plan : Unlimited access to the advanced GPT-4.1 and Claude 4 Sonnet templates, with full responses and personalized prompts (where it gets serious). Price: $20 per month . Enterprise Plan : Complete solution including team management, post-call analysis and enhanced data security (confidentiality respected). ➥ Target audience and Cluely IA use cases The most important customers for this solution are sales teams. Sales reps use it to improve their performance on customer calls (and frankly, who hasn’t had a memory lapse during an important pitch?), while managers use it to train their teams in real time. AI to cheat on exams? Now, let’s not be naive: many students saw this as an easy way to cheat on exams with AI . So its use in schools is a certainty. As a result, teachers are going to have to learn how to protect themselves against AI tools designed to encourage cheating at school. A varied customer base Furthermore, software engineers make up a significant proportion of our customer base, particularly when it comes to technical interviews. However, this practice raises important ethical questions in the professional environment (and this is where it gets tricky). Cluely AI tutorial video ➥ Controversies and ethical issues Cluely’s approach has divided the technology community. Its creators, suspended from Columbia University for having developed a similar system, fully assume their provocative positioning (they don’t go for half-measures). Despite the controversy surrounding their product, they have raised $5.3 million. Promising performance Tests carried out by specialist journalists reveal mixed performance, with significant latency times of up to 90 seconds. This slowness compromises the efficiency promised by the company’s marketing (as much as to say that 90 seconds is an eternity during an interview). That said, its performance should soon increase tenfold, and this kind of problem will soon be a thing of the past. Sounds promising! ➥ Alternatives and competitors on the market Several competing products are emerging in this emerging sector. Traditional business coaching tools like Gong or Chorus are taking a more transparent (and less polemical) approach, while other startups are developing similar AI assistants with different ethical stances. ➥ Outlook for Cluely Despite the controversy, Cluely claims 80,000 weekly active users according to the latest available data. For its part, SimilarWeb reports around 1.5 million visitors per month. As you can see, the company continues to improve its technical performance while navigating the regulatory gray areas of various countries (an ongoing balancing act). ➥ Cluely AI Reviews Without doubt, this new technology raises questions about the evolution of professional exchanges and the place of artificial intelligence in our human discussions. Nevertheless, its commercial success demonstrates that there is a real demand for this type of digital assistance. ➥ FAQ – Frequently asked questions about Cluely Who can use Cluely? + The tool mainly targets sales teams, recruiters and software engineers. However, its use raises important ethical questions, particularly in the context of job interviews where transparency is expected. Is Cluely really undetectable? + Despite marketing promises, a number of journalistic tests reveal significant limitations. Latency times can sometimes be long, and user behavior (looking away to read suggestions) can betray artificial assistance. Is this tool legal? + Legality depends on the context of use and jurisdiction. Cluely has not made a clear statement on GDPR compliance, which poses problems in Europe. In certain contexts (reviews, formal interviews), its use may violate organizations’ internal regulations. What is Cluely’s actual performance? + Independent tests show mixed results. AI can generate factual hallucinations, invent non-existent skills or omit real qualifications. The founders acknowledge that the product is still “in a very raw state”. Who are the creators of Cluely? + Roy Lee (also known as Chungin Lee) and Neel Shanmugam, two Columbia University alumni. How much money did Cluely raise? + The startup raised $5.3 million in its seed phase, followed by a $15 million Series A led by Andreessen Horowitz (a16z) , valuing the company at around $120 million. How many people use Cluely? + According to the latest available data, Cluely claims 80,000 weekly active users. The platform is becoming increasingly popular, and its future looks bright. Are there more ethical alternatives? + Yes, tools like tl;dv make it possible to record and analyze meetings with the consent of participants. These solutions encourage learning and improvement without resorting to concealment, making them more sustainable in the long term. Does Cluely run on Windows? + Cluely currently runs on both Mac and Windows. What are the risks of using Cluely? + Risks include disciplinary consequences (exclusion from exams, dismissal), legal problems linked to data confidentiality, and damage to professional reputation. The tool can also create a dependency that hinders the development of real skills. Visit Cluely website

name: Base44 Review 2026: What You Get (Credits, Backend, Export, Domains)
short_description: Hands-on Base44 review: full-stack text-to-app builder with built-in DB + auth, credit-based pricing, custom domains, and GitHub export (Builder+).
full_description: Base44 Review 2026: What You Get (Credits, Backend, Export, Domains) You know that feeling when you have a brilliant app idea, but the thought of connecting a database, an authentication system, and a frontend makes you want to nap instead? We’ve all been there. However, a tool called Base44 has been making serious waves in the no-code community. This is especially true after Wix acquired the 6-month-old, bootstrapped startup for $80 million in June 2025. Vibe coding with back-end Everyone is talking about “vibe coding” these days. The concept is simple: write plain English to build software. But most tools still force you to connect external databases like Supabase or Firebase . Base44 takes a different approach. It handles everything . We spent the last week building real projects with it (including a family chore tracker that actually works), and we’re ready to spill the tea. ➥ What Is Base44? Base44 is an AI-powered app builder that turns natural language prompts into fully functional web applications. Unlike its rivals that focus mainly on the interface, Base44 builds the full stack instantly. The platform automatically generates the back-end , front-end, database, authentication and deployment infrastructure based on what you describe. Wix’s no-code app builder You can think of it as the “Squarespace of AI coding.” In fact, you don’t manage servers or API keys. You simply tell the AI what you want, and it picks the best model (usually switching between Claude Sonnet 4 and Gemini 2.5 Pro) to write the code for you. Base44 will retain its identity and continue operating as a distinct product and business unit within Wix. This will allow the Base44 team to maintain product authenticity while tapping into Wix’s robust resources. Watch “Base44” in action Build complete applications without a single line of code. ➥ Main Features and Use Cases As with the other reviews, we tested the platform extensively to see if the hype matched reality. Here is what we found under the hood. 1. The “Text-to-App” Generator This is the heart of the system. You arrive at a chat interface. Then you type: “I want an app to manage a fleet of electric bikes with GPS tracking.” And Base44 starts coding. 2. The “All-in-One” Backend Engine Most AI builders generate a pretty interface but leave you stranded when it comes to saving data. Base44 is different. When you ask for a “Real Estate CRM,” it automatically creates the database tables for properties, agents, and clients. Base44’s unique approach offers a fully automated, chat-based interface that manages technical details behind the scenes, from databases and authentication to deployment. You don’t have to touch a single line of SQL. 3. Visual Styling & “Vibe” Control One feature we absolutely loved was the styling instruction system. Instead of fighting with CSS, you can give the AI a design direction. We typed “Claymorphism” for our test app, and the builder instantly applied those soft, 3D-style rounded corners and shadows. You can also select any element on the screen to change colors or text directly. Just like editing a slide deck! 4. Smart Integrations (No API Nightmares) Connecting third-party tools usually causes headaches. Base44 includes pre-built connectors for things like sending emails, SMS, or analyzing images. Since these run on “integration credits,” you don’t have to set up your own SendGrid or Twilio accounts for basic prototypes. This creates a seamless experience for building MVPs that actually talk to the outside world. Integration with numerous applications Starting recently, you can connect your applications with third-party services very quickly. Base44 has developed an integration system that guarantees smooth configuration without any manual steps. Here is a list of some of these possible integrations. ➥ How to Use Base44? Getting started is shockingly simple. You don’t require a computer science degree. All you need is a clear idea. Step 1: The Prompt. Start with a detailed description. For example: “Build a job board for freelance designers where companies can post listings and applicants can upload portfolios.” Step 2: The Refinement. The AI will generate a live version in about a minute. You will likely see small errors or text you want to change. Simply type: “Change the ‘Apply’ button to blue” or “Add a filter for remote jobs.” Step 3: The Data Check. Open the built-in database viewer (CMS) to see your tables. You can add dummy data here to test how the app looks when it is full of content. Step 4: Publish. Hit one button to deploy. Your app gets a live URL instantly. If you are on a paid plan, you can connect your custom domain right away. ➥ Advantages and Concrete Benefits After building three distinct apps, here is our honest assessment of the strengths and weaknesses. Pros Speed to Live: You get a working backend immediately. No time wasted setting up Supabase or Firebase. Design Quality: The default UI components look modern and professional, not like a generic bootstrap template. Integrated Auth: Login and registration work out of the box. Wix Backing: Since the acquisition, Base44’s user base has grown nearly sevenfold to over 2 million users. It’s now on track to generate at least $50 million ARR by the end of 2025. Cons Platform Lock-in: Since the database is internal, migrating away is harder than with modular tools. Credit Consumption: Complex prompts burn through your monthly message credits very quickly. Not Enterprise Ready: While great for internal tools and MVPs, it lacks granular permission controls for massive organizations. ➥ Pricing Model for Base44 Base44 operates on a credit-based system. You consume “message credits” when you ask the AI to build or edit code. “Integration credits” are consumed when your app uses features like AI text generation or email sending. Free Plan: Perfect for testing. You get about 25 message credits per month (5 per day). It includes the full database and auth features, which is generous. Starter (~$16-$20/mo): Bumps you to 100 message credits. Good for hobbyists maintaining one or two small apps. Builder (~$40-$50/mo): The sweet spot. 250 credits, plus access to backend functions and custom domains. Essential if you want to launch a product publicly. Pro & Elite ($80-$200+): For agencies or heavy builders requiring massive credit limits and priority support. ➥ Who This Tool Is Best For We believe Base44 fits a specific type of creator perfectly. Solo Founders & Entrepreneurs: If you have an idea and want to validate it by Friday, this is your tool. The all-in-one nature saves you from “integration hell.” Internal Tool Builders: Operations managers who require a custom dashboard for their team can build one in an afternoon without bothering the engineering department. Non-Technical Creatives: If you understand logic but cannot write code, the natural language interface bridges that gap beautifully. ➥ Alternatives to Base44 While we enjoyed Base44, the market is crowded. Here is how it stacks up against the competition. Lovable Lovable is the closest competitor in terms of “text-to-app” quality. It often generates slightly better initial UI designs and feels a bit faster. However, Lovable relies on you connecting a Supabase account for the database. If you prefer keeping your data separate from your frontend builder, Lovable might be a better choice. For pure convenience, Base44 wins. Bolt.new Bolt is fantastic but leans more towards developers. It gives you a full development environment in the browser. If you plan to export your code and have a team of engineers work on it later, Bolt provides a more standard coding workflow. Base44 abstracts more of the complexity away. That makes it friendlier for total beginners. Bubble The grandfather of no-code. Bubble AI is incredibly powerful and pixel-perfect, but the learning curve is steep. You have to learn their specific logic editor. Base44 is much faster to start with, but Bubble is still the king for massive, complex applications that require total control over every pixel and workflow. Comparison Table Feature Base44 Lovable Bolt.new Primary Focus All-in-one MVP Builder Beautiful UI & Frontend Full-Stack Dev Environment Database Built-in (Zero setup) External (Supabase) External / Code-based Requires Coding Knowledge? No No Low (helps to know basics) Code Export Yes (Paid plans) Yes Yes (StackBlitz) Best For Speed & Convenience Design-first projects Developer collaboration ➥ Conclusion and review of Base44 Base44 has impressed us. In a market flooded with AI tools that deliver broken code, this platform actually delivers a functioning product. The decision to integrate the database and authentication directly into the platform is a massive time-saver. Anyone who just wants to build without managing a tech stack will appreciate this. Base44, a bootstrapped AI startup, was acquired by Wix in roughly 500 days. That gives us confidence this is not just a flash in the pan. While it might not replace a team of senior engineers for a Fortune 500 banking app, it is arguably the best way to go from “napkin sketch” to “working product” in 2026. If you have an idea that has been sitting in your notes app for months, give the free plan a spin. You might surprise yourself with what you can build before dinner. Try Base44 ➥ Frequently Asked Questions Does Base44 really write the backend code? + Yes. When you describe your app, the AI generates the database schema and the API logic required to fetch and save data. You can view and edit this data in a spreadsheet-like view within the dashboard. Can I export my code if I want to leave? + Yes, paid plans include an export feature. You can also sync with GitHub. However, since the database is built-in, you would have to set up your own database solution if you decide to host the app elsewhere. Is the free plan enough to build a real app? + The free plan is excellent for building and testing a complete prototype. It includes authentication and database access. However, the message limits are tight (5 per day). So you will require a paid plan for heavy iteration or to connect a custom domain. What happens if I run out of credits? + If you hit your limit, you cannot send new prompts to the AI until the next month or until you upgrade. Your live app will continue to function for your visitors. This is true provided you have not exceeded the integration credits (like email sending). How does the Wix acquisition affect Base44? + Base44 will retain its identity and continue operating as a distinct product and business unit within Wix. This has led to better stability and more resources for development. We are seeing deeper integrations with the Wix ecosystem for things like payments and marketing tools. Can I build mobile apps with Base44? + Base44 builds responsive web applications (PWAs) that work great on mobile browsers. It does not currently generate native iOS or Android files (APK/IPA) directly. That said, the web apps feel very app-like on phones. Visit Base44 website

name: Search Atlas Review: Can It Truly Transform SEO?
short_description: Search Atlas helps you automate your SEO strategy with AI: technical optimizations, content creation, backlink management and competitive analyses. Ideal for agencies and corporations.
full_description: Search Atlas Review: Can It Truly Transform SEO? We’ve tested countless SEO platforms over the years. But Search Atlas caught our attention for a reason. Billed as a serious challenger to tools like Semrush, Search Atlas combines AI-driven automation with powerful SEO features designed for scalability, precision, and ease of use. In this review, we’ll break down what Search Atlas offers, explore its key features, highlight its strengths and weaknesses, and look at pricing. By the end, you’ll know exactly what sets Search Atlas apart—and whether it’s the right fit for your SEO strategy. ➥ What Is Search Atlas? Search Atlas is an all-in-one SEO and PPC platform developed by Manick Bhan, a data scientist and marketer aiming to reshape search marketing. Designed to automate and scale SEO efforts, it offers a suite of tools that handle everything from keyword research and content planning to technical audits and live page updates. What sets it apart is the use of AI agents like OTTO SEO, which can implement changes directly to your website—ideal for brands and agencies managing large content volumes. ➥ What sets Search Atlas Apart? Search Atlas is launching a completely new set of tools designed for automation and scalability. It provides a centralized platform with features like keyword research, content planning, technical SEO, link building, and rank tracking, all integrated with AI to reduce manual work. ➥ What Search Atlas Tools Support SEO at Scale? Below is a breakdown of newly introduced tools and updates to existing ones, organized by key SEO categories. AI SEO Agent Search Atlas’ AI SEO agent is called OTTO SEO. This is the first AI agent built to fully automate your SEO strategy. It handles keyword research, technical SEO, content optimization, link building, and more. This is not just an AI writer or an assistant that provides recommendations. OTTO SEO actually makes changes to your site so you can scale faster with less manual work. Keyword Research Search Atlas gives you access to a large database of keywords organized by volume, competition, intent, and trend. The Keyword Magic Tool generates structured keyword clusters, helping you plan pages around user intent and search behavior. Keyword Gap lets you compare your site against competitors to find keywords you haven’t targeted yet—essential for expanding visibility in competitive markets. OTTO SEO automatically identifies high-impact keywords and integrates them into your content, optimizing it for both users and search engines. Technical SEO Audits The platform includes site auditing tools with built-in crawlers, including its own or integrations with Google and Screaming Frog. You can analyze site health, speed, Core Web Vitals, mobile usability, internal linking, schema, and more. Search Atlas also features Dynamic Indexing and Instant Indexing—tools that help ensure your new or updated pages are discovered and indexed by Google quickly. This ensures changes are reflected in search results in near real-time. Competitor Research The Site Explorer tool provides a full breakdown of competitor performance: organic traffic, paid campaigns, backlinks, top-performing content, and keywords. Unlike metrics like Domain Authority (DA), Search Atlas uses its proprietary Domain Power (DP), which evaluates authority based on real performance data like keyword rankings and GSC metrics. Topical Dominance is another unique feature. It shows how thoroughly you or your competitors cover a specific topic, helping you identify content gaps and refine strategy at scale. On-Page Optimization Search Atlas includes a powerful on-page optimization tool that scans your pages for issues like thin content, keyword stuffing, missing meta tags, slow loading times, and more. Then OTTO SEO takes it further, automatically optimizing titles, descriptions, image alt text, schema markup, and meta tags across your entire site. Whether you have 10 pages or 10,000, OTTO can apply updates in bulk and saves hours of manual work. ➥ Pricing Transparent, scalable pricing Search Atlas offers tiered pricing: Starter – $99/mo: For small businesses. Includes 1 OTTO SEO. Growth – $199/mo: For mid-size teams. Includes 2 OTTO SEO. Pro – $499/mo: For scaling brands. Includes 4 OTTO SEO. Enterprise – Custom pricing for large-scale SEO operations. As your site count grows, the cost per activation decreases—as low as $39 per site—making it affordable for agencies and businesses managing multiple domains. Each plan includes access to core tools, and you can expand as needed. ➥ Designed for scaling teams AI tools tailored for marketers Search Atlas includes AI-driven features like: Automated Link Building: Allows you to get backlinks by internal links based on content relationships Content Genius: For generating optimized content AI Content Assistant: For rewriting, analyzing, and structuring text Content Planner: Groups keywords by topic and intent for bulk strategy Instant Schema Markup: Applies structured data automatically These tools are tightly integrated into the dashboard and work together with OTTO SEO to keep your content competitive. ➥ Trial Search Atlas offers a 7-day free trial with full access to its tools. Onboarding sessions, tutorials, and guided walkthroughs are available to help you get started. Customer support The team is available to help with implementation questions or technical issues, and 1:1 onboarding sessions are offered to walk you through the platform and address any specific needs directly. ➥ Alternatives to Search Atlas While there are strong competitors like Ahrefs, Semrush, and SE Ranking, Search Atlas sets itself apart through automation, scalability, and cost-efficiency. If you’re managing dozens or hundreds of pages and looking for a solution that grows with your business, it offers a compelling alternative. ➥ Final thoughts Search Atlas is a robust SEO platform designed for growth-focused teams and businesses. Its automation capabilities and scalable pricing make it especially well-suited for managing multi-site environments. The AI agents handle much of the repetitive work, so you can focus on strategy instead of routine tasks. If you want to simplify your SEO efforts while scaling up performance, the free trial is a risk-free way to see how Search Atlas fits into your workflow. ➥ FAQ What is Search Atlas? Search Atlas is an all-in-one SEO platform offering tools for keyword research, on-page optimization, technical SEO, link building, and AI-driven automation. It’s designed to help brands and agencies scale their SEO efforts faster and more efficiently. Is Search Atlas beginner-friendly? Absolutely. The platform is easy to navigate, and new users get access to step-by-step tutorials and personalized onboarding sessions. Does Search Atlas offer a free trial? Yes, you can try it for free. The trial includes helpful email guidance to walk you through key features and tools. Visit Search Atlas website

The entire process typically completes within minutes, depending on your video’s length and complexity—no technical expertise or learning curve required. ➥ Perfect Applications for Different Content Types Social media creators find the website particularly valuable for YouTube content, TikTok videos, Instagram Reels, and Shorts. The tool excels at travel vlogs, makeup tutorials, gaming videos, reaction clips, and lifestyle content where background distractions need elimination. Business applications include product demos, social media ads, testimonial videos, and promotional content. Marketing agencies and e-commerce brands can apply brand colors, logos, or promotional graphics while maintaining professional consistency. full_description: Claude 4: the ultra-powerful AI model – Reviews, Prices & Alternatives It’s been a long wait, but it’s finally here! Claude 4 , Anthropic’s new model, is now available to all. Conversational tools such as ChatGPT and Gemini have become part of our daily lives in just a few months. In this context, the release of a new model has become an eagerly awaited event. A step in the right direction Since its first version was presented in March 2023, this new model has evolved considerably, distinguishing itself by its power, its ethics and its ability to generate useful, nuanced and reliable results. Introducing the new 2025 version! How-to video on Claude 4 What exactly is Claude 4? Claude 4 is the latest language model developed by Anthropic (a company founded by former OpenAI members). It is a conversational assistant capable of coding, generating text, answering questions, summarizing long documents and producing structured content. Safer artificial intelligence In fact, it’s part of this new generation of so-called responsible AIs. These are designed to avoid the biases and drifts that can occur with large language models. A new (high-performance) method But what makes it different is its design basis: the so-called “Constitutional AI” approach. This method aims to frame AI responses with a built-in form of ethical awareness. Rather than simply looking for the “most likely” answer, Claude 4 learns to provide an adapted response that is coherent with a set of human principles. ➥ These operating rules are defined as soon as the model is trained, and govern the way it expresses itself and reasons. How does Claude 4 work? Technically, Claude 4 is based on an architecture similar to that of LLMs (Large Language Models) such as GPT-4, but with some notable features: It can handle very long contexts, up to several hundred thousand tokens. This means it can “read” and analyze very large documents without losing the thread of the conversation. It incorporates a form of self-regulation based on rules (the famous “constitution”). This consists of a set of ethical principles on which the model relies to verify its answers. It is trained to recognize sensitive, ambiguous or ethically complex situations. ➥ This hybrid operation makes it not only powerful, but also more predictable and less likely to produce “hallucinated” responses. This makes it a reassuring tool for professionals and businesses alike. Claude 4 Sonnet and Opus Claude 4 is currently available in two main versions: Sonnet 4 and Opus 4. Claude Sonnet 4 is a general-purpose model, renowned for its balance of speed, adaptability and precision. It excels in content generation, chatbots and automation. Claude Opus 4 is the most powerful version in the range. It has been designed for tasks requiring in-depth reasoning, long-term memory and complex project management. Why is Claude 4 the best? Ethical alignment : Thanks to the Constitutional AI approach, Claude 4 is designed to avoid drift. Contextual understanding : very good at handling long, detailed documents. Precision and reliability: its answers are coherent, well-argued and contextualized. Multi-skilling: writing, summarizing, reformulating, analyzing, simulating dialogue, coding – Claude can do (almost) anything. Clear language: the texts generated by Claude 4 are structured, easy to read and adapted to the target audience. Adaptability : Claude 4 can be adjusted to different tones (formal, friendly, technical…) and formats. ➥ Its greatest asset is its ability to code. Indeed, this LLM model is reputed to be one of the best for coding tasks (and even the best, according to many developers). Real-world use cases ✍️ Copywriting: create a blog post, write a personalized cover letter, proofread a document with a natural tone. 📚 Study: generate a PDF reading sheet, reformulate an academic extract, prepare a PowerPoint presentation. 📊 Analysis: extract key points from a report, transform raw data into an interpreted summary. 💬 Communication: simulate a customer conversation, write follow-up emails, produce chatbot scripts. 👨‍💻 Code : generate functions, comment on code, fix simple bugs. 🧠 Training: generate quizzes, create lesson plans or summarize a training program. A memorable anecdote In a real-life test, a team of legal experts submitted a 12-page commercial contract to Claude 4. In less than 45 seconds, the model produced a structured 6-point summary, with alerts on contentious clauses. A performance praised by the professionals, who noted that no important point had been overlooked. On another occasion, Claude generated a complete FAQ for the customer service department of an SME, with a surprising consistency of tone and structure. Why is it useful for entrepreneurs? For freelancers, start-up managers or digital marketing professionals, Claude 4 provides invaluable assistance: Save time on low-value-added tasks Improve your marketing materials without recruiting Automate your editorial processes while staying in control Test ideas, prototypes or concepts at low cost Centralize your internal knowledge in the form of usable content ➥ Claude 4 can also be integrated into business tools (CRM, HR tools, etc.) to generate real-time content and improve overall team productivity. What’s the price of Claude 4? For traditional subscriptions, Claude offers a free Pro subscription at $17/month (or $20/month with no commitment). Also on the menu are packages like Claude Max (from $100/month) and Claude Team ($30 per user/month). These packages are more expensive, but offer higher usage limits and priority access to certain features. Prices for APIs For APIs, let’s start with Claude Sonnet 4, priced at 3$ per million input tokens and $15 per million output tokens. Claude Opus 4, Anthropic’s most powerful version, is priced at $15 per million tokens in and $75 per million tokens out . A model built for the future? The question deserves to be asked! Claude 4 isn’t content just to be “good” today: he’s anticipating tomorrow’s challenges. How do we do this? By integrating the dimensions of ethics, transparency and collaboration, it redefines what AI at the service of humans should be. Model Context Protocol (MCP) It’s safe to say that this is a model that prioritizes “humanity”, ‘clarity’ and “responsibility”. It’s no longer just about going fast, but going right (towards AGI?). We should also note the recent introduction of the MCP protocol , a real turning point in the democratization of artificial intelligence. Some useful resources List of MCP servers Free AI video tutorials « Understanding how AI works is the first step towards mastering it. » (ManU) Conclusion and review Claude 4 isn’t just another competitor in the AI race among all the models we know. In our view, this LLM model embodies a new generation of tools that are smarter, more responsible and more useful in everyday life. By discovering it today, you’ll be one step ahead of your competitors. Its efficiency, clarity and integrated thinking make it a highly trusted digital partner. Get started right now! Visit Claude 4 website

name: Veo 3 Google: an AI video generator with sound!

full_description: Veo 3 Google: an AI video generator with sound! Ever wished you could turn your imagination into video without expensive equipment or technical skills? Veo 3 Google is making that dream a reality! This groundbreaking tool from Google DeepMind isn’t just another AI generator, it’s revolutionizing how anyone can create beautiful videos complete with synchronized sound, all from simple text or image prompts. ➥ What is Veo 3 Google? Remember the frustration of creating videos that look great but sound terrible? Veo 3 Google solves this common headache by building on its predecessor’s strengths with something truly game-changing: native audio generation . A high-quality AI video generator Imagine typing a quick description and getting back not just realistic visuals, but also perfectly matched sound effects, background ambience, and even character dialogue with spot-on lip-syncing! While you’re limited to 8-second HD clips per prompt, these bite-sized videos are perfect for social media, quick demonstrations, or sparking creative ideas. ➥ How Easy Is It to Use? You don’t need a film degree to create stunning videos anymore! The process couldn’t be simpler: Describe what you want to see (or upload an inspiration image) Let the AI work its magic Enjoy your professional-looking video with matching audio Right now, this creative powerhouse is available to Google AI Ultra subscribers in the US, with wider availability on the horizon. ➥ Taking Your Videos to the Next Level with Google Flow Want to create something more ambitious? Veo 3 Google works hand-in-hand with Flow, Google’s new filmmaking application designed for creators like you. Think of Flow as your digital film studio where you can: Edit and extend your video clips Organize your creative assets Control virtual cameras for different angles Build complex scenes with intuitive tools ➥ Trust and Transparency Built In It’s a key point! So, you’ll be pleased to know that Every video created with Veo 3 Google carries a SynthID watermark, a digital signature that clearly identifies AI-generated content. This thoughtful approach helps maintain transparency without compromising quality. Why Are Creators Falling in Love with Veo 3 Google? Sound and vision together at last! No more hunting for the perfect soundtrack or sound effects Physics that make sense – objects move naturally in the generated scenes What you ask for is what you get – improved prompt adherence means fewer frustrating results Professional-grade without the learning curve – create in seconds, not hours Ready for bigger projects – seamless integration with Google Flow ➥ What is the Price of Veo 3 Google? name: Rayo AI: SEO-Optimized Content & Automated Copywriting
short_description: Rayo is an AI platform that automates the writing of SEO-optimized articles. You get titles, keywords, structure, and fluid content, while maintaining authenticity and reliability.
full_description: Rayo AI: SEO-Optimized Content & Automated Copywriting Rayo is an artificial intelligence program specially designed to create content for search engines. It helps digital marketing professionals and web writers generate high-quality, well-ranked texts that sound natural. This program aims to simplify the creation of high-performing web content so organizations can focus on their overall content strategy. (It’s a real time saver.) ➥ What is Rayo? Rayo is a real asset for automatically creating web texts. Its goal is to generate writing that appeals to search engine algorithms while also sounding authentic to readers. It seeks a balance between the technical requirements of SEO and the simplicity of a human-written text. (This is a key point for success.) In addition, the program includes several tools. It helps create titles with the right keywords and can generate content outlines inspired by top-performing articles. This ensures a solid structure for effective texts. For writing teams, Rayo also offers smart research and direct publishing, making the whole process smoother. It also tracks reader engagement and provides suggestions to make the text even more impactful. ➥ How Does Rayo Work? Rayo operates through AI algorithms that understand the subtleties of language and SEO rules. It handles the writing of brand descriptions, catchy slogans, blog scripts, ad copy, and social media captions. To use Rayo, you simply tell it what you want to write and the topic. The program then analyzes these inputs to create a well-structured and relevant first draft. This process uses a large database and in-depth knowledge of today’s SEO best practices. You can also choose the desired writing style to match your brand’s voice. This makes content creation easier, as the AI takes care of repetitive tasks—freeing creators to focus more on strategy and final editing. Structured Outline Generation One interesting feature of Rayo is its ability to generate content outlines based on the top-ranked articles on the web. This ensures the content is well organized and aligned with what users are searching for. It’s a real time-saver for any writing team. Keyword Optimization The program searches for and integrates important keywords right from the title and paragraph planning stage. This ensures that the text is both easy to read and SEO-friendly. This greatly improves visibility in search engines. Such text has a much higher chance of appearing among the top results. Integrated Research and Publishing Rayo makes it easier to research information before writing. It can also help publish completed content. By keeping everything in one place, it streamlines the workflow from start to finish. The process is designed to minimize interruptions, allowing articles to be published faster. (Very handy for meeting deadlines.) ➥ Advantages and Disadvantages Rayo offers many benefits for content professionals. However, there are also some points to consider. Main advantages: Produces content much faster: saves significant time in content creation. Improves search engine rankings: by optimizing text structure and keywords. Keeps a consistent tone: maintains brand style across all content. Suggests ideas based on data: ensures relevance to audience interests. Boosts reader engagement: improves interaction with published content. Simplifies research and publishing: all tools in one place. Main limitations to keep in mind: Needs human fact-checking: to ensure information accuracy. Cannot 100% replace human thinking: lacks strategic decision-making. Learning curve: takes time to master for full potential. ➥ How Much Does Rayo Cost? Official pricing information for Rayo is not very clear. It seems to be accessible by invitation or direct request. As a result, there is no fixed price listed on their main site. To find out the cost, interested users must request it on the official website . This suggests that pricing is likely tailored to each company’s needs and size. You need to speak directly with the sales team to learn about the different pricing options. ➥ Who is Rayo For? Rayo is aimed at various professionals and companies looking to boost their online presence through content. It’s particularly useful for those who produce a lot of writing or want to strengthen their SEO. Here are some examples of who can benefit from this tool: SEO Specialists Those responsible for search engine optimization will find Rayo a great help. It allows them to produce texts that meet best SEO practices. The tool can generate titles and content structures optimized for search engines, which is a big plus for professionals aiming to climb the rankings. Writers and Content Creators For writers, whether working solo or in teams, Rayo provides valuable support. It helps overcome writer’s block and speeds up content production. The program can create a variety of text formats, from blog posts to product descriptions. Digital Marketing Agencies Agencies managing content strategies for multiple clients can benefit from Rayo’s efficiency while maintaining quality. Automating part of the content creation process frees up time for strategic work and client communication. Companies with Ambitious Content Strategies Any company looking to produce more content to attract more visitors will find Rayo highly useful. It’s a great way to regularly publish well-crafted, SEO-friendly texts—crucial for a successful content strategy. ➥ Reviews on Rayo Feedback on Rayo as an AI program for SEO content shows strong potential for professionals. Those familiar with its capabilities see it as a way to make web content creation easier and better. The fact that it helps to create texts that rank well and sound human is a real plus. ➥ FAQ Here we answer the most frequently asked questions about Rayo. Is Rayo only for SEO content? + Yes, it mainly focuses on creating search engine–optimized content to make texts more visible and better ranked online. Its main tools revolve around organic SEO. Is content generated by Rayo original? + Rayo aims to produce human-sounding and unique content through its AI algorithms. It helps avoid duplicate content by generating fresh and relevant text. Does Rayo help with topic research? + Yes, Rayo includes smart research tools to help prepare content. For example, it can find ideas and useful information for your articles, making the preparation phase easier before writing. Try Rayo for free and boost your SEO today! Visit Rayo website

name: Notion Mail Review: The AI Upgrade Your Gmail Deserves
short_description: Notion Mail is an AI inbox that connects to your Gmail and can perform all kinds of tasks: write e-mails, organize your messages, schedule meetings and more.
full_description: Notion Mail Review: The AI Upgrade Your Gmail Deserves Are you drowning in emails? You’re not alone. Most of us spend hours each week sorting through endless messages. That’s exactly why Notion Mail exists. It connects directly to your Gmail account. So you get a smarter inbox without changing your email address. Reaching inbox zero feels impossible for most professionals. This app tackles that exact frustration head-on. It uses artificial intelligence to do the heavy lifting. You stay in control while the software handles tedious tasks. Let’s explore how it performs in real life. ➥ What Is Notion Mail and How Does It Work? Think of Notion Mail as a supercharged wrapper for your Google email. It’s not a separate email provider. Instead, it acts as a smarter client. Just log in with your current credentials. The system then studies your communication patterns. The core idea? Automation and intelligence. It knows the difference between a cold sales pitch and a client request. As a result, it organizes your view by priority. You stop missing important updates buried in the noise. It honestly feels like having a digital assistant. ➥ Main Features of Notion Mail This software brings several powerful capabilities to the table. It goes far beyond simple sending and receiving. The developers focused on boosting productivity . Here are the standout functions you’ll discover. AI-Powered Writing Assistance Writing emails drains mental energy. Notion Mail can draft responses for you. You provide a short context or command. The AI then expands this into a complete, polished message. You can also adjust the tone to be formal or casual. Even better, it learns your specific writing style over time. The suggestions start to sound more like you. This saves precious minutes on every reply. Just review, tweak, and hit send. No more staring at a blank screen. Smart Organization and Sorting Your inbox probably looks like a chaotic mess. This tool sorts incoming items automatically. It groups newsletters, receipts, and personal notes separately. You see what matters right away. On top of that, it creates smart labels. You don’t have to set up complex rules manually. The system detects the content type. It then files the message in the correct virtual folder. This keeps your main view clean and focused. Seamless Meeting Scheduling Coordinating calendars usually requires multiple tabs. Notion Mail integrates scheduling directly into the composer. You can propose times without leaving the window. It checks your availability in real-time. It can also detect meeting requests within the email text. The software highlights these dates. You can add them to your agenda with a single action. This reduces the friction of planning appointments. ➥ Advantages of Using Notion Mail Why switch from the standard Gmail interface? The benefits become clear after just a few hours. First, the mental load decreases significantly. You no longer have to process every single subject line manually. Second, your communication speed improves. AI-drafted replies help you clear the queue faster. You become more responsive to clients and colleagues. This efficiency can boost your professional reputation. Plus, the interface is typically cleaner and less distracting. ➥ Notion Mail vs Gmail: comparison To clarify the added value, here is a quick comparison table. Feature Gmail (Classic) Notion Mail Organization Labels and static folders Custom views and detailed filters Writing Basic editor Block-based editor (slash commands) Automatic classification Complex manual filters Intuitive AI classification Design Dense and colorful Minimalist and calm ➥ Who Should Use Notion Mail? This tool fits certain profiles perfectly. Freelancers will love the time saved on admin tasks. They can focus more on billable work. Small business owners also benefit greatly. They often handle support and sales alone. Freelancers: To separate leads from invoices and manage client follow-up like a lightweight CRM . Project managers: Those who want to turn email requests into concrete tasks. Notion fans: If your work already relies on databases, this email service is the missing piece. Corporate managers dealing with high email volume will also find relief. If you receive over fifty messages daily, this can help. It’s also great for tech fans who enjoy optimizing their workflow. However, casual communicators might find it overkill. What about you? How many emails do you get each day? ➥ Detailed Pricing Model Budget often dictates software choices. Good news: Notion Mail has a free-forever plan. This makes it a low-risk option to try. You don’t have to commit credit card details upfront. Keep in mind that AI features may require a paid Notion plan. Tools like this often introduce premium tiers eventually. For now, you can explore the core features without payment. It’s an excellent time to give it a try. ➥ Conclusion: Is Notion Mail Worth Your Time? Email management remains a universal challenge. Notion Mail proposes a compelling solution. It combines Gmail’s reliability with modern AI smarts. The result is a faster, cleaner experience. The writing assistant alone might justify the switch for many. Add in the smart sorting, and it becomes a productivity powerhouse. You have nothing to lose since the basic version costs nothing. Give your inbox the upgrade it deserves. Your future self will thank you for the extra free time. Try Notion Mail ➥ Frequently Asked Questions about Notion Mail Is Notion Mail safe to use? + Yes, security is a priority. The tool connects via official APIs. It does not store your passwords. You retain control over your data privacy. Does it work with Outlook or Yahoo? + Currently, Notion Mail only works with Gmail and Google accounts. Other providers might arrive later. So if you’re on Outlook, you’ll have to wait. Can I switch back to standard Gmail? + Absolutely. You can stop using the tool anytime. Your messages remain in your Google account. You lose nothing by trying the interface. How good is the AI writing? + The quality is surprisingly high. It understands context well. However, you should always review the text. It acts as a drafter, not the final decision maker. Visit Notion Mail website
