name: Manus AI: An Autonomous AI Agent – Pricing, Reviews & Top Alternatives
short_description: Manus AI is an autonomous agent that executes tasks without human input. It navigates the web, automates workflows, and boosts productivity. Try it now!
full_description: Manus AI Agent: demonstration video Manus AI: An Autonomous AI Agent – Pricing, Reviews & Top Alternatives Have you ever dreamed of having a virtual assistant who would actually do the work for you, without you having to supervise every step? It’s an idea that many of us fantasize about every time our to-do list overflows! Well, that dream is coming true with this AI agent called « Manus AI », this new artificial intelligence agent that has been causing a sensation in the tech world since its launch on March 6, 2025. This impressive Chinese innovation doesn’t just suggest what to do, it does it for you, from A to Z, without human intervention! ➥ The multi-agent approach that changes everything Unlike conventional AI assistants, which simply generate text (sometimes relevant, sometimes less so…), Manus works like a real virtual team. Imagine several AI specialists all working together: An expert in information research An experienced data analyst A talented content creator A meticulous quality checker It’s a bit like having a mini-company working for you 24/7! Sounds dreamy, doesn’t it? A practical example For example, when Manus analyzes stock market data, one model retrieves the information in real time, another generates explanatory graphs, while a « quality controller » ensures that everything is accurate and relevant. This in-house collaboration has enabled Manus to achieve outstanding performance in GAIA tests, outperforming even the most established solutions. ➥ What can the Manus AI agent actually do? Manus doesn’t just do one thing, it’s a true digital strategy tool! Its skills include: Document creation : From professional reports to PowerPoint presentations, all generated automatically Analysis of data : Turning raw data into actionable statistics Automatic planning : Plan your next trip or business project Automation of processes : Sort resumes, analyze real estate, and more His ability to convert a complicated academic PDF into a clear, visually appealing presentation is particularly impressive. Say goodbye to sleepless nights before important meetings! ➥ Beyond suggestions: full execution Have you ever been frustrated by a tool that tells you what you should do, without actually helping you to do it? Manus AI agent goes one step further. Where traditional assistants stop at advice, Manus AI takes matters into its own hands. It doesn’t just say « here’s how you could analyze this data », it analyzes it precisely, adjusts its strategy along the way if necessary, and delivers a ready-to-use end result. Screenshot from the official Manus.im website. That’s the equivalent of having an ultra-competent colleague who not only understands what you want, but achieves it without you having to constantly check his or her work. Every manager’s dream! ➥ An AI agent that learns about you What makes the Manus AI agent truly special is its capacity for continuous learning. It combines : Explicit knowledge (industry standards, best practices) Implicit experience (based on previous cases) Your personal preferences (which it memorizes over time) If you prefer your reports in Excel spreadsheets rather than Word documents, Manus AI will remember this. If you like a certain style of presentation, he’ll adopt it for his future creations. ➥ Applications in the real world Here’s how Manus could fit into different business contexts: For recruiters Imagine being able to scan hundreds of CVs and receive not only a list of the best candidates, but also a detailed analysis of their skills, experience and compatibility with your corporate culture. For real estate agents What if you could automatically obtain full neighborhood analyses, including crime statistics, school quality and market trends, all presented in a format that could be easily shared with your customers? For financial analysts What would your day be like if your morning market reports were automatically generated while you slept? You could then concentrate on strategic interpretation rather than data collection. ➥ Integration with various external tools A major strength of Manus lies in its integration with various external tools: Web browsers (search for updated information) Programming editors (development assistance) Database management systems (handling structured information) ➥ The question many people ask… Does Manus AI mark the beginning of a new era in our relationship with technology? Everything seems to point to it. Indeed, its ability to operate truly autonomously, understand complex intentions and execute multiple tasks end-to-end is quite incredible. But let’s not get ahead of ourselves, as the world of AI agents is still very new. However, Manus AI looks set to shake up the world of artificial intelligence in the months to come. ➥ How to try Manus AI? The Manus AI agent is currently available in a limited internal beta version. Would you like to try out this promising technology? Here’s how: 1. Join the waiting list on the Monica.im website (the company behind Manus) 2. Priority access is granted to professionals with specific use cases 3. During the test phase, you can explore automation functionalities for financial analysis, recruitment and real estate search. Early testers are already impressed, with some calling Manus « the trainee who never sleeps »! To maximize your chances of access, be specific about your automation needs when you register. (To access you need an invitation code) ➥ Conclusion and review of the Manus AI agent The wonder of seeing a GPS guiding you through an unfamiliar city for the first time is comparable to the awe provoked by the AI agent Manus. But this time for navigating our (often) complex professional tasks. What’s your review of Manus AI? So what do you think of this new trend? Are you ready to try a truly autonomous assistant in your workflow? The intelligent automation revolution is underway, and Manus AI seems well positioned to be one of the leaders. FAQ about Manus AI agent Who developed Manus AI? + Manus AI was developed by Monica.im , a Chinese startup founded by Xiao Hong. The team also includes Ji Yichao, former founder of Peak Labs and developer of the Magi search engine. What is the price of Manus AI? + Currently, Manus AI is available by invitation only and in beta version. No official price has been announced, but rumors point to high prices for enterprise versions. Invitation codes are selling for up to $13,900 on secondary markets. How do I get an invitation code for Manus AI? + It’s easy: you can apply directly from the site via the official invitation code application link. Then you’ll have to wait a while and hope for a positive response. Is it safe to use this AI agent? + Operating Manus AI could present risks for the confidentiality of data stored on external servers. Several governments, including the State of Tennessee, have banned its use on their networks. We recommend caution with sensitive data. (This advice applies to all artificial intelligence services) Is Manus AI a true Artificial General Intelligence (AGI)? + Although Manus has impressive AGI-like characteristics, he is not yet a true AGI. He excels at performing a variety of tasks, but does not yet possess the deep understanding and self-awareness associated with a full AGI. Visit Manus AI Agent website

name: Chatgot: the free AI chatbot assistant (honest review)
short_description: ChatGOT is a virtual assistant that uses several AI models at the same time. Generate presentations, create images and customize your own AI agent.
full_description: Chatgot: the free AI chatbot assistant (honest review) Tired of juggling 10 different tabs to test ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and all the others? I get you! That’s exactly the problem Chatgot solves in a smart way. Picture this: all your favorite AIs gathered in one interface. No more remembering 15 different passwords or losing track of conversations. Chatgot feels like having a Swiss Army knife of artificial intelligence at your fingertips. ➥ So, what exactly is Chatgot? In short, Chatgot brings GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek, and many others together on a single platform. It’s like inviting your favorite experts to the same table for a stimulating debate. The idea is brilliantly simple: why waste time hopping from site to site when everything can be in one place? You ask a question and instantly see how each AI approaches it differently. Sometimes, those varied perspectives give you the exact solution you were looking for! A collaborative approach that changes the game What makes Chatgot stand out is its ability to make AIs work together. You can compare responses in real time or let the system automatically pick the best AI for your query. It’s like having a personal assistant who knows exactly whom to consult depending on the situation! ➥ How does it work? (Spoiler: it’s super simple!) Screenshot from Chatgot.io official website Good news: no tech expertise required! Just open the site, type your question, and you’re ready to go. You don’t even need an account to try it out. Pretty rare these days, right? The steps? Almost none! You type your question: just like chatting with a friend The chosen AI (or multiple AIs) answers: based on your request Not satisfied? reformulate or ask for another perspective It’s smooth, intuitive, and adapts to the way you like to communicate. A digital Swiss Army knife But that’s not all! Chatgot goes way beyond simple chatting. You can: Analyze your PDFs: no more manual summaries Generate code: even if you’re a beginner Create original images: with AI’s help Design presentations: assisted by AI Access live web data: always up to date See the potential? It’s like having a full team of experts by your side. Build your custom assistant Here’s the kicker: you can design your own personalized assistant. A virtual fitness coach, a Moroccan cuisine expert, or even a travel companion who knows the best local spots… the possibilities are endless! This customization completely reshapes the experience. Your AI becomes YOUR assistant, tailored to your specific expectations. ➥ Pros and cons (let’s be honest!) Like everything, Chatgot has its strengths and a few small drawbacks. But overall, the positives win by far! What makes it shine: All your AI models in one place: easy access Side-by-side response comparison: practical for decision-making Instant access without signup: quick and simple testing Lightning-fast responses: almost instant Complete toolset: everything you might need Custom assistant creation: tailored usage Minor drawbacks: Quality varies: depending on the chosen AI Occasional interruptions: rare but possible A small learning curve: to master all features Nothing deal-breaking, right? ➥ How much does ChatGOT cost? (Get ready to be surprised) The good news: Chatgot has plans for every budget. You can even start free to test it out! Free Plan 10 questions a day, perfect for exploring. Sure, premium features stay locked, but it’s enough to get a feel for the platform. Pro Plan 6000 regular questions + 400 advanced ones, plus credits for images and presentations. That’s when you truly unlock the platform’s power. Max Plan For heavy users: 8000 regular questions, 500 advanced, plus even more creative credits. Pro tip: annual subscriptions usually come with attractive discounts! ➥ Who is it for? (Spoiler: pretty much everyone!) Wondering if Chatgot is right for you? Chances are, yes! For individuals Great for curiosity, quick answers, or just engaging conversations. For students Your new study buddy for research, summaries, and homework help. Learning just got a whole lot smoother! For professionals Writers, developers, marketers… you’ll love the productivity boost. Content creation, coding, analysis: it’s all here. For creators The image generation and writing tools will take your imagination further than ever. ➥ Competitors: alternatives to ChatGOT Name Price Highlights Link ChatGPT Free / €20 per month Market reference, very flexible chat.openai.com Claude Free / €20 per month Refined conversations, extended context claude.ai Google Gemini Free Google integration, real-time info gemini.google.com Perplexity AI Free / €20 per month Fact-based search with sources perplexity.ai Microsoft Copilot Free (MS accounts) Perfect Office integration copilot.microsoft.com ➥ Honest review of ChatGOT Overall, feedback is very positive! The most common praise is the “all-in-one” aspect that saves a ton of time. No more switching between platforms! The ChatGOT interface is applauded for its simplicity. Even those less comfortable with tech find it easy to use. A rare advantage in a world where everything keeps getting more complicated. Of course, some mention performance differences depending on the AI used. That’s to be expected: each model has its strengths! What matters most is having the choice. All in all, Chatgot looks like a go-to solution for anyone wanting to explore AI without hassle. And honestly, who wouldn’t want that? ➥ Your questions, our answers Do I need to create an account to start? + Not at all! You can test right away with the basic functions. That’s one of Chatgot’s biggest perks. Can I really compare answers from different AIs? + Absolutely! It’s one of the key features. You ask a question and see how each AI tackles it. Very eye-opening! Are the answers reliable? + As with any AI, you need to keep a critical mind. But having multiple viewpoints helps you identify the best answers. Visit ChatGOT website

name: Semrush Social Toolkit: Powerful AI tools for your social networks
short_description: Discover Semrush Social Toolkit, the powerful suite of AI tools for optimized management of your social networks. Real-time analysis, planning and performance monitoring.
full_description: Updated Semrush Social Toolkit: Powerful AI tools for your social networks Social networks have become a central pillar for companies looking to increase their visibility. Successful management of these platforms depends on tools capable of analyzing performance and optimizing publications. This is where Semrush Social Toolkit comes in, with a truly all-in-one solution. ➥ But, what is Semrush Social Toolkit? Semrush Social Toolkit is a complete social network management suite. It features six core modules: Social Dashboard, Social Poster, Social Tracker, Social Analytics, Social Content Insights and Social Content AI . This easy-to-use platform enables you to analyze, plan and optimize your social networking presence from a centralized interface. Quality « made in Semrush » When using any software or service, it’s always a safe bet to be dealing with a reputable platform. In the case of this collection of AI tools dedicated to social media, the SEO and marketing company Semrush is behind the creation. So you can go ahead with peace of mind! ➥ The 6 tools of Semrush Social 1. Social Dashboard The dashboard centralizes all essential social media metrics in one place. It is capable of displaying key statistics such as subscriber growth, engagement rate and post reach. Thanks to customizable graphs, you can follow the evolution of KPIs (key performance indicators) over different periods. This feature also allows you to quickly detect brand mentions and comments requiring a response. 2. Social Poster This tool simplifies the management of publications on Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, Pinterest and TikTok from a single interface. The visual editorial calendar lets you schedule posts in advance and visualize the distribution of content. The Starter version allows 50 monthly posts , while the Plus subscription offers unlimited posts. What’s more, a built-in AI assistant helps you write engaging posts. 3. Social Tracker The module analyzes the performance of competitor accounts on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube and Pinterest in real time. This provides you with detailed reports on their audience, activity and interactions. In this way, the data collected will enable you to identify the best-performing content in the sector and identify emerging trends (viral). Last but not least, exporting reports in PDF format will help you share this information with your teams. 4. Social Analytics This invaluable tool brings together performance data from Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn and TikTok. It accurately measures subscriber growth , post reach and engagement levels. Customizable reports show you which metrics to track over time and identify the most effective content formats. 5. Social Content Insights This service performs an in-depth analysis of post performance using a customizable tags system . This allows you to categorize content and evaluate which types of posts generate the most engagement. In addition, advanced filters make it easier to identify long-term trends in your audience’s preferences. 6. Social Content AI This complementary tool uses artificial intelligence to generate content suggestions adapted to each platform. Every day, it suggests personalized post ideas based on your sector of activity, and helps you create original visuals. What’s more, its built-in AI assistant lets you fine-tune the tone and style of your publications. This true writing partner is extremely useful, and once you’ve had a taste of it, it’s hard to do without. The time savings are huge! Try Semrush Social Toolkit ➥ Why choose Semrush Social Toolkit? Time-saving: Automate recurring tasks and simplify publication management. Detailed analysis: Access precise indicators to fine-tune your strategy. Improving competitiveness: Monitor your competitors’ performance and adjust your approach. Adaptable: Tailor functionalities to your business objectives. ➥ How can you integrate Semrush Social Toolkit into your strategy? To take full advantage of Semrush Social Toolkit, it is important to follow a few simple steps: Connect your social media accounts. Configure publication scheduling. Analyze performance and adjust strategy. Use insights to improve engagement. ➥ What is the price of Semrush Social Toolkit ? Semrush Social Toolkit offers three subscription packages, both of which are relatively affordable. The Base package : aimed at freelancers and small teams, it is available at $20 per month and lets you manage up to 5 social profiles while tracking 10 competitor profiles. The Pro package : designed for companies and agencies, is priced at $40 per month and includes management of 10 social profiles as well as monitoring of 20 competitor profiles. The Business package: created especially for professionals, it offers you all the Pro features + influencer analysis + Media Monitoring (2 keywords to monitor), and is available for $249.95 per month . Both packages come with access to essential features such as the Social Dashboard, Social Poster and Social Tracker. A free trial period is also available to test the platform. ➥ Easy-to-read guides and documentation To deepen your understanding of each module, Semrush provides detailed documentation. You can consult the full list of documentation for each tool by clicking on the following links: Social Tracker , Social Analytics , Social Content Insights , Social Content AI , Social Dashboard and Social Poster . full_description: 9 best free alternatives to Museland AI in 2025 Looking for a new platform to replace Museland AI? Saddened by the shutdown of this great AI chatbot site? You’re not alone! However, every platform has something special, and we hope that this page dedicated to alternatives and sites similar to Museland AI has helped you! If you just want to hang out, find a friend or do some role-playing, there’s sure to be a good substitute in our list.. Until next time, happy chatting with your new digital friends! name: Sprout Social Review 2026: Pricing, Smart Inbox, AI & Tagger (Worth it?)
short_description: Sprout Social review in 2026: Smart Inbox, ViralPost, social listening, AI, and Tagger (influencer marketing). Who it's for, how much it costs, and the best alternatives.
full_description: Sprout Social Review 2026: Pricing, Smart Inbox, AI & Tagger (Worth it?) Sprout Social might just be the reason your social media manager hasn’t quit yet. We tested this platform extensively to see if the hype matches the price tag. Managing one Instagram account is fun. But managing twenty accounts across LinkedIn, TikTok, Threads, and X (formerly Twitter) without a proper tool? That’s a recipe for disaster. You want a tool that centralizes everything. You want detailed reports to show your boss why that meme strategy worked. Sprout Social says it can handle the chaos. But with a price point that makes many CFOs sweat, is it really worth the investment in 2026? Let’s look at the facts. ➥ What Is Sprout Social? Sprout Social is an all-in-one management platform for social media professionals. Unlike basic schedulers that just post content, this software acts as a central hub for every brand interaction you receive. Picture it as mission control. It combines publishing, deep listening, engagement, and analytics into one interface. Recently, they acquired Tagger Media to integrate influencer marketing directly into the workflow. The tool targets teams that want to scale their efforts without losing the human touch. If you manage customer service through social channels, Sprout handles the heavy lifting. ➥ Main Features and Use Cases We spent weeks testing the dashboard. Here are the features that actually make a difference in daily work. 1. The Smart Inbox This is the star of the show. Instead of jumping between Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn tabs, you see every message in one stream. We connected five different profiles, and the inbox gathered all comments and DMs instantly. You can tag messages, assign them to team members, or mark them as complete. Nothing slips through the cracks anymore. 2. AI Assist and Automation Artificial intelligence in Sprout Social is practical, not just a buzzword. The “Enhance by AI Assist” feature tweaks your tone. You write a rough draft, and the AI polishes it to sound more professional or friendly. It also analyzes sentiment. You instantly know if a sudden spike in mentions is positive love or a PR crisis about to explode. 3. Powerful Analytics Most tools give you vanity metrics. Sprout gives you business intelligence. The reports look beautiful straight out of the box. You can track competitor performance and see exactly which days your audience engages most. We particularly liked the “Optimal Send Times” feature. It analyzes your specific audience data to suggest when to post. 4. Influencer Marketing (Tagger Integration) This is a major update for 2026. You can now find and manage influencers directly within the platform. The semantic search helps you find creators who actually match your brand values. It’s not just about high follower counts anymore. ➥ How to Use Sprout Social? Getting started is surprisingly painless compared to legacy enterprise software. Connect Your Profiles: Link your accounts. It supports everything from TikTok to Google Business Profiles. Configure Your Keywords: Set up “Brand Keywords” in the listening tab. You’ll see posts that mention your brand even if they don’t tag you. Populate the Calendar: Upload your assets. Use the AI features to generate alt text and captions quickly. Check the Inbox Daily: Treat the Smart Inbox like your email. Aim for “Inbox Zero” by archiving handled messages. ➥ Advantages and Concrete Benefits Why would a team pay a premium for this? Here is what we found: Cohesive Workflow: Your team stays on the same page. No more accidental double-replies to customers. Data Visualization: The reports require zero editing before sending them to clients or executives. Reliability: We experienced zero downtime or failed posts during our testing period. Customer Care Focus: It turns social media into a legitimate support channel with CRM features. ➥ What is the price of Sprout Social? Sprout Social positions itself as a premium product. You can try Sprout Social for free with a 30-day trial. However, there is no permanent free tier. The costs reflect its enterprise capabilities. Standard Plan: Starts around $199 per seat/month. Includes 5 profiles. Professional Plan: Starts around $299 per seat/month. This unlocks unlimited profiles and detailed reporting. Advanced Plan: Starts around $399 per seat/month. Includes chatbots and automated link tracking. Enterprise: Custom pricing for large organizations. Note: Prices often change, so check their official site for the latest figures. ➥ Who Is This Tool Best For? Sprout Social fits specific profiles. It is ideal for marketing agencies managing multiple high-ticket clients. Large enterprises with dedicated customer support teams on social media will also find immense value. Are you a freelancer or a local bakery with one Instagram page? This tool is likely overkill for your budget. ➥ Alternatives to Sprout Social If the price tag makes your eyes water, several capable alternatives exist. Agorapulse Agorapulse is a strong contender. It provides a very similar “Social Inbox” and excellent reporting at a more accessible price point. Their listening tools are robust, and they charge less per additional person. Hootsuite The veteran in the space. Hootsuite supports a massive number of integrations. The interface feels a bit older, yet it gets the job done for scheduling and monitoring streams. Comparison Table Feature Sprout Social Agorapulse Hootsuite Primary Focus Enterprise & Customer Care Mid-Market & Agencies Broad Social Management Smart Inbox Excellent (All-in-one) Great (All-in-one) Good (Stream-based) Pricing High ($$$) Medium ($$) Variable ($$-$$$) Free Plan No (Trial only) Yes (Limited) No (Trial only) ➥ Conclusion and Review about Sprout Social Sprout Social creates a calm environment out of social media chaos. The Smart Inbox alone saves hours of manual work every week. The last updates, especially the AI integrations and Tagger influencer tools, cement its status as a leader for serious brands. However, the cost is a high barrier. You pay for quality, stability, and deep analytics. If your social media strategy drives direct revenue or handles significant customer support volume, Sprout Social pays for itself. If you just want to schedule a few tweets, look elsewhere. Ready to organize your social channels? Start your free trial today and see how much time you save. Try Sprout Social ➥ FAQ Is Sprout Social really free? + No, it is not permanently free. They provide a robust 30-day free trial that gives you full access to the features. After the trial, you must choose a paid subscription plan. Does Sprout Social use AI? + Yes, extensively. The platform uses AI to analyze sentiment in messages. It also suggests optimal posting times and helps rewrite captions for better engagement tones. Can I manage LinkedIn and TikTok with Sprout? + Absolutely. The platform supports all major networks. This includes LinkedIn (personal and company pages), TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, Pinterest, YouTube, and X. Is it worth the high price tag? + For teams that collaborate and report data to stakeholders, yes. The time saved on reporting and inbox management often justifies the monthly cost for businesses. Does it include social listening? + Social listening is available but often comes as an add-on. It may also be part of the higher-tier plans. This feature lets you track conversations about your brand across the web, not just on your profiles. Visit Sprout Social website

name: Workleap: the AI-powered automated management platform for employees
short_description: Workleap is a comprehensive HR platform that makes your employees' day-to-day work easier. Manage the performance, commitment and development of your teams using AI tools.
full_description: Workleap: the AI-powered automated management platform for employees Workleap addresses new HR challenges by providing leadership teams with tangible technological support. With employee well-being and organizational performance now top priorities, this intelligent system is increasingly becoming an essential tool in modern workplaces. This premium HR solution delivers AI-assisted management with automated tools designed to support human resources professionals in their daily work. ➥ What is Workleap? Workleap is a system that helps manage talent through artificial intelligence. Its main goal? Simplify daily work life. Based in Canada, the company develops software for employees, designed not only to improve team performance but also to strengthen engagement. It is a modular suite that integrates seamlessly with your existing HR tools. A complete product architecture On the Workleap website, you will find two main categories of products. First, the Workleap app designed for HR. Then, ShareGate, another of their solutions, well known for Microsoft 365 migration and management. It is particularly useful for IT specialists, especially for technical tasks. Additionally, Workleap is expanding through strategic acquisitions. For example, they recently acquired Barley, a comprehensive compensation management tool. Watch the demo video Try Workleap ➥ How does Workleap work? In practice, Workleap connects different aspects of the employee experience to simplify daily tasks and support productivity. The tool provides real-time insights, helping leaders make better decisions. Its efficiency comes from clear and practical tools designed to truly serve those who use them. Targeted modules for every goal This approach includes several modules, each with a specific purpose. For instance, Workleap Officevibe focuses on engagement, feedback, and recognition. It enables automated surveys, real-time insights, and even early detection of disengagement. How? Thanks to AI-generated summaries — a major advantage for HR teams. Workleap Performance Workleap Performance focuses on results management. It includes tools to structure evaluation cycles, run self-assessments, collect peer feedback, and efficiently track OKRs (Objectives and Key Results). Artificial intelligence integration AI is a central feature of Workleap. It is included (at no extra cost) in every product and provides actionable insights. For more detailed analysis and advanced customization, the Workleap AI+ module is available. name: Semrush SEO Toolkit: Marketing powered by AI – Reviews, Pricing & Alternatives
short_description: Optimize your SEO and marketing with Semrush SEO Toolkit. Benefit from an integrated assistant, keyword research, optimized content generation, data analysis, etc.
full_description: Updated Semrush SEO Toolkit: Marketing powered by AI – Reviews, Pricing & Alternatives Search engine optimization (SEO) techniques have become an essential element for any company wishing to effectively develop its online presence. In this context, Semrush SEO Toolkit has emerged on the market as a high-quality, all-in-one solution for professionals in digital marketing. With the latest update, you can now access over 20 professional-quality tools!  But did you know that Semrush.com is now integrating artificial intelligence into several of its services? ➥ A complete suite of marketing tools Semrush SEO Toolkit stands out for the number of SEO tools, statistics and data it offers. In fact, with over 20 marketing tools integrated into the platform, you’ll have access to everything you need to rank in the top positions on Google . This SEO product also lets you easily analyze your positioning, optimize your content and monitor your competitors. Like other sites in our “ AI Marketing Tools ” category, this one has an intuitive interface and is fully translated into several languages (an important point). ➥ Really powerful features Search for keywords The platform gives you access to an impressive database of over 25 billion keywords. This means you can quickly identify the most relevant terms for your sector, and analyze their search volume and difficulty. In-depth technical audit This SEO tool provides a complete scan of your website to detect technical errors, SEO problems and opportunities for improvement. This in-depth analysis makes it easy to optimize the technical aspects of your site. Competitor analysis The Semrush website is particularly good at competitive analysis. In fact, the site lets you discover the strategies of your SEO competitors , identify their high-performance keywords and analyze their backlinks tactics with precision. Positioning tracking This “Rank Tracking” feature helps you track variations in Google rankings, compare your positions with the competition, identify your best-performing pages and spot fluctuations in rankings. ➥ What’s the price of Semrush SEO Toolkit? The site currently offers three packages: Pro : Ideal for freelancers and small businesses ($139.95/month) Guru : Perfect for growing agencies ($249.95/month) Business : Designed for large companies ($499.95/month) Screenshot from Semrush.com Try Semrush ➥ Who can benefit from Semrush SEO Toolkit? The software is particularly aimed at digital marketing managers, freelance SEO consultants, web agencies and entrepreneurs who want to improve their visibility on the web. Thanks to its freedom of use, it can meet the requirements of start-ups of all sizes. Companies like Tesla or Amazon, for example, use the premium SEO software Semrush . ➥ Product highlights An intuitive interface Its interface is easy to learn, thanks to clear navigation, integrated tutorials and a multilingual interface (available in 14 languages). What’s more, this ergonomic design ensures rapid adoption by your teams. Trustworthy data Semrush updates its database daily. This service guarantees up-to-date information and accurate analysis for your SEO projects. Semrush has received numerous awards. It’s a leader in the SEO and marketing sector. ➥ Essentials SEO and AI tools The Semrush website has recently expanded its arsenal (already impressive) with powerful artificial intelligence solutions. Powerful and popular AI Tools 1. Semrush Content Toolkit helps you produce SEO-optimized articles by analyzing the content that works in your field. 2. Semrush Social Toolkit assists you in managing your social networks by suggesting targeted and effective publications. 3. AdClarity analyzes your competitors’ advertising strategies in real time across more than 650,000 publishers in 51 global markets (SEA). Its centralized dashboard tracks spending and performance of display, video and social campaigns. 4. AdCreative.ai quickly generates optimized visuals and texts for different advertising platforms. The tool draws on a database of high-performance ads to create personalized ads with a predictive conversion score. Real-time monitoring At the same time, this ecosystem also integrates indispensable functionalities such as Position Tracking, which monitors your positions in real time. Finally, the “Site Audit” enables you to examine the technical aspects of your website in depth. External link analysis And let’s not forget the Backlink Analytics tool, which lets you explore your link profile, or the Link Building Tool, which makes it much easier to identify the best backlink opportunities in your industry (a must!). Try Semrush ➥ Personalized recommendations by an AI assistant Semrush’s AI assistant analyzes your website’s performance on a daily basis. In real time, it detects variations in your keyword positioning and alerts you to opportunities to be seized. Case study For example, if a query is losing visibility, the assistant suggests concrete actions to improve its ranking. Conversely, when a keyword gains in popularity, it suggests SEO strategies to capitalize on this trend. AI-based marketing strategy ➥ Can Semrush be free? Well, yes! Semrush free of charge is perfectly feasible, but with a few restrictions. At the moment, Semrush SEO Toolkit has two free options for discovering its suite of SEO tools. The first requires only registration and allows you to use the platform with limitations. Main limitations of the free account : Maximum 10 searches per day (quota reset daily) Site audit limited to 100 pages maximum A single project with local position monitoring only Access to the first 10 results only for keyword searches For social networks: 10 publications per month and monitoring of up to 50 competitor profiles 7-day trial period The second method consists of a free 7-day trial period that gives you full access to all the tools. This means you have unlimited access to all Semrush services ! Screenshot from Semrush.com ➥ Top-quality customer service and technical support Semrush SEO Toolkit supports two approaches to mastering its suite of tools. In fact, you can easily opt for live coaching or self-training. A free Semrush demo! To get started, you can request a free demo that will allow you to explore the interface with the help of an expert. This is the ideal way to quickly test out the features of this SEO software. Live chat Once you’re a customer, of course, the helpdesk remains accessible via live chat, with instant responses. Ask your questions by e-mail For more specific questions, you can also send an e-mail directly to the Semrush team at [email protected] . Please note that client service deals with e-mail inquiries within 24 working hours. In addition, a contact form is available. The best alternatives to Semrush SEO Toolkit For features similar to Semrush SEO Toolkit, you can look to SE Ranking, which delivers a fairly affordable alternative, Similarweb, performing well in traffic analysis, or Ahrefs, renowned for its powerful backlink analysis. ➥ Semrush SEO Toolkit conclusion and review Without a doubt, Semrush SEO Toolkit represents a strategic investment for any company serious about SEO. What’s more, its rich functionality, data quality and ease of use make it a benchmark tool in the field of digital marketing. Although the initial investment may seem substantial, the return on investment is usually rapid for users who take full advantage of its functionalities. Try Semrush Mini FAQ : Frequently asked questions about Semrush SEO Toolkit What exactly is Semrush SEO Toolkit? + Semrush SEO Toolkit is a digital marketing platform with tools for SEO, content marketing, competitive analysis, PPC and social networks. It’s one of the best-known and most popular tools. How can Semrush SEO Toolkit help with keyword research? + The site includes tools such as the Keyword Magic Tool to identify relevant keywords and analyze their search volume and difficulty. Are Semrush services appropriate for SEO beginners? + Yes, Semrush is conceived to be used by digital marketers of all levels, including beginners. Does Semrush SEO Toolkit also offer educational resources for users? + Absolutely! The site has tutorials, webinars and courses to help you quickly master its many tools. Visit Semrush SEO Toolkit website

name: DeepSeek-R1: The open-source AI that’s changing the game
short_description: DeepSeek-R1 is an open-source LLM model that excels in mathematical reasoning and programming. Solve complex problems and generate code with precision.
full_description: DeepSeek-R1: The open-source AI that’s changing the game It’s been impossible to miss the excitement surrounding DeepSeek-R1 in recent weeks! This new artificial intelligence is redefining the standards set by OpenAI, thanks in particular to its o1 model. But why is it generating so much interest? Let us explain. Power that exceeds expectations The figures speak for themselves: DeepSeek-R1 outperforms current benchmarks on AIME, MATH-500 and SWE-bench Verified tests. At the heart of this success? A system with 671 billion parameters. However, the development team was able to adapt its project to different technical realities: lighter versions, from 1.5 to 70 billion parameters, are now available. Quality-price ratio makes all the difference Let’s talk numbers again: DeepSeek-R1 costs 90-95% less than its direct competitors. This substantial price difference, combined with its open source MIT license, makes the tool particularly attractive to independent developers and companies of all sizes. How does his reasoning system work? DeepSeek-R1’s major strength lies in its system of self-checking facts. This meticulous approach considerably enhances its reliability, particularly in scientific, mathematical and physical fields. Admittedly, response times are slightly longer, but the accuracy of the results justifies this patience. Redesigned accessibility DeepSeek-R1’s great strength lies in its multiple versions. The lighter versions run perfectly on standard laptops, while the full version naturally requires greater resources. Key points to remember MIT license : Total freedom of use, even for commercial projects Technical accessibility: Versions adapted to different hardware configurations Distribution: Available via the DeepSeek API and the Hugging Face What impact will DeepSeek-R1 have on the AI industry? This new model represents a significant step forward in the democratization of high-performance AI models. Its open-source approach and excellent value for money overturn the standards set by the major players in the sector. The availability of lighter versions also enables wider adoption, facilitating innovation in many application fields. FAQ Is DeepSeek-R1 available for commercial use? Yes, thanks to its MIT license, it can be used without restriction for commercial projects. Can DeepSeek-R1 be run on a personal computer? The lighter distilled versions can run on a simple laptop, while the full version requires more powerful hardware. Are there any limitations to its use? As a Chinese model, DeepSeek-R1 is subject to certain regulatory restrictions concerning sensitive subjects. How to access DeepSeek-R1? This LLM model is accessible via the DeepSeek API and the Hugging Face platform.  Here is the current list of places where you can test DeepSeek-R1: Deepseek Chat Abacus Anychat OpenRouter Visit DeepSeek-R1 website

name: o3 from OpenAI: The super-powerful AI model that breaks new limits
short_description: O3 is the new super-powerful model from OpenAI. It excels in math, science and programming with record scores. Solve even the most complex problems!
full_description: o3 from OpenAI: The super-powerful AI model that breaks new limits OpenAI o3 and o3-mini in video demonstration OpenAI unveils its latest artificial intelligence model, o3 , which marks a major advance in natural language processing. This new technology stands out in particular for its exceptional capacity for reasoning and analysis.3-mini video demonstration ➥ A new architecture for enhanced performance The o3 model introduces an innovative concept: the “private chain of thought”. In practical terms, artificial intelligence takes the time to analyze each problem in depth before formulating an answer. As a result, the results obtained are significantly more accurate, particularly in scientific and mathematical fields. ➥ Very high performance Tests show impressive results. o3 scored 96.7% on the American Invitational Mathematics 2024 exam, for example. What’s more, on the Codeforces platform, the model achieved a ranking of 2727 points, surpassing even the performance of OpenAI’s Chief Scientist. ➥ A family of models o3 comes in several versions to suit different use cases. The main version is designed for complex tasks requiring in-depth analysis. In parallel, o3-mini offers three declinations (low, medium, high) tailored to specific needs. ➥ Remarkable results on ARC-AGI O3’s results on the ARC-AGI (Abstract Reasoning Challenge for AGI) test deserve particular attention. The model succeeded in solving 87% of the abstract puzzles offered, surpassing the scores of earlier versions of GPT. This performance on ARC-AGI testifies to o3’s ability to understand and manipulate complex abstract concepts, particularly in novel situations requiring advanced spatial and logical reasoning. Key points to remember Advanced reasoning: Solved 87% of ARC-AGI puzzles, demonstrating excellent analytical skills Mathematical Performance: AIME 2024 score of 96.7%, outperforming previous models Flexibility: Three o3-mini versions for different application contexts Extra safety: Extensive public test phase prior to launch Capacity for Programming: Score of 2727 on Codeforces, setting a new benchmark Advanced Analysis: A “private chain of thought” system for more precise answers ➥ How to test OpenAI’s o3 For the time being, o3 is only available to researchers and testers selected as part of the public safety program. Nevertheless, OpenAI plans to set up a waiting list in early 2025 for developers wishing to experience the beta version. Registration will be via the OpenAI platform, with priority given to members who have already worked on GPT-4. ➥ A release planned for 2025 OpenAI plans to launch o3-mini at the end of January 2025, followed by the full version of o3. Currently, the model is in the public safety test phase, allowing researchers to evaluate its capabilities. ➥ FAQ What’s the difference between o3 and previous models? o3 stands out for its advanced reasoning capability and “private chain of thought” system. When will o3 be available? The launch is scheduled for early 2025, with o3-mini available at the end of January. How does o3 perform in mathematics? o3 scored 96.7% at AIME 2024 and solves 25.2% of problems in EpochAI’s Frontier Math benchmark. How o3-mini works o3-mini offers three performance levels (low, medium, high) tailored to different uses and response times. What are o3’s areas of excellence? o3 particularly excels in programming, mathematics and solving complex scientific problems. What’s the difference between o3 and previous models? o3 stands out for its advanced reasoning capability and “private chain of thought” system. Visit o3 by OpenAI website

name: iFable: Your Gameplay Grows AI Soulmates
short_description: Enter the world of iFable's extraordinary visual games, where you and your favorite character forge a unique bond thanks to the creativity of AI.
full_description: iFable: Your Gameplay Grows AI Soulmates Step Into iFable, A Universe of Visual Gaming Wonder : Where you and your favorite character forge a unique bond through AI Creativity. ➥ What is iFable? iFable, is an anime character roleplay game designed to help players forge deep and lasting emotional connections with their favourite characters through various missions and engaging gameplay. Have you ever dreamed of creating a personalised RPG where you can freely shape your character and build deep connections ? We will have four types of relationships: acquaintance, friendship, romance, and family (this feature will be launching around April 16th). How to build a relationship between players and characters is the core of the game. In addition to the main RPG adventure gameplay, you can develop character relationships through one-on-one chats and a drink puzzle game . One feature of iFable AI that I’m truly amazed by is the aesthetic quality of character illustrations, gaming CG and Real-time voice interaction . Once you unlock affection level five or higher with a character, their illustration will appear on your homepage. Currently, some characters are supported with dynamic displays. An infinite world of possibilities! Real-Time Story CG Generation: Experience your story through stunning anime-style illustrations as character relationships evolve and plot twists emerge. Multi-Character Stories: Create vibrant group scenes with up to 8 characters interact with natural character conversations that bring your story to life. Voice & Sound Experience: Bring your story to life with customizable character voices and ambient sound effects. name: Willow: the new quantum chip developed by Google
short_description: Willow is a quantum chip developed by Google that reduces calculation errors exponentially. Capable of super-powerful calculations!
full_description: Willow: the new quantum chip developed by Google Google continues to transform the future of technology with the Willow Quantum Chip , a revolutionary processor designed to push back the frontiers of quantum computing. Here’s a clear, detailed look at this promising innovation. What is the Willow quantum chip? The Willow Chip is a quantum processor developed by Google, designed to perform complex calculations by exploiting the laws of quantum mechanics . Unlike conventional processors, this chipset uses qubits (quantum bits), which can exist in several states simultaneously thanks to the phenomenon of superposition. Key technical specifications Advanced architecture: The Willow Quantum Chip incorporates an optimized architecture to improve coherence and reduce errors, a major challenge in quantum computing. High-fidelity qubits: The processor’s qubits offer enhanced precision in calculations, thanks to reduced error rates. Increased processing power: This processor is designed to solve optimization, molecular modeling and cryptographic problems far beyond the capabilities of traditional computers. Compatibility with classical systems: Google is working on seamless integration between classical and quantum systems, enabling collaboration between the two technologies. Potential applications for the Willow quantum chip This new quantum chip has the potential to transform several sectors: Computer security: improve encryption protocols with quantum algorithms. Industrial optimization: solving complex problems, such as network management or supply chain optimization. Medical research: simulating molecular interactions to accelerate the discovery of new drugs. Climatology and energy: modeling complex systems to better understand and predict climate change. Why is this so important? The development of the Willow Quantum Chip puts Google at the forefront of the race for quantum supremacy, a stage where quantum processors definitively outperform conventional computers in certain tasks. With advances like this, quantum computing is one step closer to concrete applications that could transform our everyday lives. To learn more about this Chip and its potential, check out the full article on the Google blog (click on the blue button below). Visit Willow by Google website

full_description: Lovable Review: The AI Tool That Builds Software for You Got a brilliant startup idea but no coding skills? Lovable might just be your answer. This platform bridges the gap between your vision and a real, functional product. No technical background required. Forget hiring expensive developers. Instead, you simply chat with an AI that does the heavy work. So, how does this tool actually work? And why is everyone talking about it? Let’s find out. ➥ What is the Lovable AI tool? If you are familiar with “GPT Engineer,” you should know that Lovable is its direct evolution. This is a No Code and Low Code platform powered by artificial intelligence. It generates websites and web applications from plain English descriptions. You type what you want, and the system writes the code instantly. Think of it as a skilled engineer sitting right next to you. The goal? Make software creation accessible to everyone. Most tools still require some technical knowledge or drag-and-drop skills. Lovable removes those barriers entirely. You become the architect; the AI acts as your builder. ➥ Key features of the Lovable platform First impressions matter, and the interface is refreshingly simple. It looks like a standard chat window. Build functional applications: This tool handles database connections, logic, and more. Create interactive elements: Sign-up forms, dashboards, and dynamic features are all possible. The speed is genuinely impressive. Have you ever wished you could see your idea come to life in minutes? That’s exactly what happens here. ➥ Concrete benefits of using Lovable Speed defines the experience. Traditional development takes weeks or months. This platform delivers results in minutes. You save time, resources, and frustration. As a result, you can test market ideas rapidly. Accuracy is another strong point. The AI understands context remarkably well. It rarely produces code that breaks. Almost every time, you get a working product. Check out the comparison below to see the value. Feature Benefit for You Natural Language Input No syntax or complex jargon to learn. Instant Preview See your changes immediately as you type. Full-Stack Generation Builds both the look and the logic behind it. Iterative Edits Refine your app endlessly with simple commands. ➥ How much does Lovable cost? Budget concerns often kill projects before they even start. Fortunately, Lovable has accessible entry points. The Free plan is ideal for individual explorers testing the platform’s capabilities. For solo developers, the Pro plan costs $25 per month. Teams can access the Business plan at $50 per month per seat. The company uses a land-and-expand strategy: start with a free tier, then upgrade as your project grows. This means startups can build an MVP for minimal cost. That’s a massive advantage for new creators on a tight budget. ➥ Who is the Lovable tool best for? Non-technical founders will love this platform. You have the vision but lack the engineering degree. This tool empowers you to build alone while keeping full control over your product roadmap. Other groups that benefit: Freelancers and agencies: Prototype concepts for clients in record time. Marketing teams: Build landing pages without waiting for IT. Designers: Turn design ideas into reality without spending hours in tools like Figma. The platform converts screenshots directly into working code. Does your idea keep sitting on the shelf? The barrier to entry is low, and the results are robust. The interface feels intuitive. The output is reliable. If you’ve been waiting for the right moment to act, this might be it. Give this platform a spin. You might just build your next big SaaS product today. Try Lovable ➥ FAQ about Lovable Is Lovable really free to use? + Yes, the Free plan is ideal for individual explorers testing the platform. You can access core features without a credit card. name: Sora: OpenAI’s Amazing New Video Generator
short_description: Sora is an AI model created by OpenAI capable of generating stunning 60-second videos from simple text prompts.
full_description: Sora: OpenAI’s Amazing New Video Generator The world of AI video generators is in full swing! A newcomer has entered the scene, and what it has to offer is nothing short of incredible. His name? Sora! With the latest Text-to-Video model “ Sora ” from the OpenAI company, it’s now possible to create videos from simple text. So far, nothing new, you may say. But this powerful model far surpasses all other Text-to-Video models available on the market. In this article, we’ll explore the incredible capabilities of this model. Impressive performance The Sora model is capable of generating so-called “hyper-realistic” video scenes, to the point where it’s difficult to distinguish that an AI is behind the video. The video clips generated by this artificial intelligence are of exceptional visual quality, and respond perfectly to requests made via a prompt. What’s more, this model can create videos of up to one minute in length, while maintaining outstanding visual rendering. A real game-changer for the industry! OpenAI’s goals OpenAI’s objective with Sora is to form models capable of understanding and simulating the physical world in motion. These models are intended to solve problems that require interaction in the real world. This video generator represents a real leap forward in this direction. Sora’s skills Sora not only generates videos, it is also capable of understanding the video content generated and solving specific security-related problems. It can create complex scenes with multiple characters, specific movements and precise details of subject and background. The best [Text-to-Video] for 2024? It is also possible to generate multiple shots within a single video, while maintaining perfect consistency between them. This feature ensures more dynamic and convincing videos. Is Sora a safe model? To prevent Sora from being used inappropriately, OpenAI has taken strict security measures. Teams of experts test the model and detect any potentially dangerous content. The American company also works with artists, educators and policy-makers around the world to understand their concerns and continually improve its video generator. Frequently asked questions How realistic are the videos generated by Sora? Yes, the videos generated by Sora are incredibly realistic. Details such as skin texture, eye reflections and character movements are amazingly accurate. It is capable of simulating the physical world with great fidelity. What is the maximum length of a video generated by Sora? The maximum length of a video generated by Sora is one minute. This means you can create attractive, high-impact videos. Can this video generator understand and interpret a prompt? Yes, Sora has a deep understanding of language, enabling him to interpret text instructions with precision. He can also generate characters and convey vibrant emotions based on your prompt. What are Sora’s limitations? This generator may have difficulty simulating physics accurately in complex scenes, and may confuse specific spatial details. In addition, it can sometimes lack understanding of cause-and-effect relationships, which can lead to unexpected results. Opinion and conclusion OpenAI’s Sora model takes text-to-video creation to a whole new level. Visual quality and fidelity to instructions seem to be the order of the day. Sora’s ability to create realistic videos lasting over 60 seconds is truly impressive. Visit Sora by OpenAI website

Your AI character remembers your previous exchanges, learns your tastes, and adapts to your style of conversation. The more you chat with it, the more unique and personalized it becomes for you. ➥ The spicy options that change everything What makes SpicyChat (really) different is its total freedom and therefore NSFW chat sessions. No strict filters that ruin the mood in the middle of an interesting chat session. All topics are possible, from intense role-playing to deep philosophical discussions or more… intimate exchanges. This adds a visual dimension that makes the experience much more exciting. Also note that this feature is very popular with AI girlfriends and AI boyfriends. Voice calls for more realism What if you’re more of an auditory learner? Perfect! It’s entirely possible to have voice conversations with your AI character. Send them voice messages, and they’ll understand perfectly and respond in kind. Try Spicychat AI for free ➥ Why users love (and sometimes hate) According to feedback on Trustpilot, SpicyChat divides opinion. Some are huge fans of the NSFW aspect of the platform and the fact that they can finally have unlimited, uncensored sex chats. Other customers complain about technical issues: commands that don’t always work, AI memory that sometimes forgets important details, or slow response times during peak hours. But hey, that’s the price you pay for a chatbot site that focuses on freedom rather than technical perfection! ➥ What are the real prices of Spicychat AI? SpicyChat offers packages for all budgets: Free: Includes unlimited messages, full chatbot library access, NSFW content, character creation, and conversation saving. “Get a Taste” ($5.00/month): Provides an ad-free experience, shorter wait times, and contextual memory management, with up to 10 “Personas” per member. “True Supporter” ($14.95/month): Adds 8K contextual memory, Semantic Memory 2.0, longer responses, image generation during chats, and access to extra models, with up to 50 “Personas.” “I’m All In” ($24.95/month): Unlocks the full experience with 16K contextual memory, priority generation queue, access to SpicyXL and advanced models, image generation for private chat agents, and AI voice synthesis, with up to 100 “Personas.” To give you an idea: in terms of price, SpicyChat is clearly in the same vein as Kindroid (around $15 per month), more affordable than Replika ($20) but slightly more expensive than Character AI ($10). With a 17% discount if you sign up for an annual subscription. Honestly, even at $15 a month, it’s still cheaper than dinner at a restaurant for hours of entertainment. ➥ Create THE perfect AI character The real magic of SpicyChat is that you can create custom characters for NSFW role-playing games. Creating multiple characters is also a reality Another great thing , you can create multiple characters for different moods. One for fun, another for serious conversations, a third for… well, you get the idea. Each one keeps its own personality and memories of your discussions. So, you can browse other users’ creations, get inspired, or just adopt an AI character you like. Moreover, if you need assistance, the Spicychat.ai Discord community is very active. And if that’s still not enough, you can always consult the official Spicychat documentation , which is very comprehensive. Sometimes you have to repeat the same instruction several times. When it comes to memory, this adult chatbot can also have gaps: your AI character may forget important details from your previous conversations. It’s frustrating when you’ve spent time explaining your preferences to them! ➥ What are the best alternatives to SpicyChat AI? Compared to Kindroid, Character AI, or Replika, SpicyChat is all about freedom. No censorship, no forbidden topics, no “Sorry, I can’t talk about that.” This is its big advantage. Reviews on SpicyChat AI The reviews on Spicychat are really very good. It has to be said that it is one of the most popular NSFW chat sites in the world right now. In fact, its growth is phenomenal! It is now one of the most visited sites in the world (more than 50 million visitors per month). This (very) saucy chatbot, with its selfies , video, and voice call options, is one of the “AI dating sites” you absolutely must try. Try Spicychat AI now SpicyChat FAQ: Questions and Answers Is SpicyChat AI really free? + You can start for free, but you will have to wait in line to access the servers. To avoid waiting and unlock all features, paid subscriptions start at $5/month with “Get a Taste.” Are my conversations with AI characters private? + Totally! Your chats stay between you and your virtual characters. No one else can see them, not even the SpicyChat team. It’s your personal space, free from judgment. How many characters can I create? + It depends on your subscription: 3 with the entry-level plan, up to 100 with the premium plan. How many AI characters can I create? + This is limited in the free version, but with the paid plans you can create multiple characters. 3 with the entry-level plan, up to 100 with the premium plan. Does SpicyChat work on mobile devices? + Yes! The “Spicy Chat: AI boy & girl” app is available on Android and iOS. You can also use the web version on any browser. Is there really no censorship? + This is one of SpicyChat’s biggest features: very few restrictions compared to other platforms. In reality, you can freely discuss (almost) any topic. Does my AI character remember our conversations? + Yes, but be careful because the quality of the memory is determined by your subscription. Paid plans offer better performance. Can I share my creations with other users? + Of course you can! It’s even encouraged. You can make your personas public so that others can discover them. What should I do if my AI character says something wrong? + If this happens to you, use commands such as /cmd to refocus the conversation and guide your character in the right direction. Sometimes you have to insist a little, but it works. Can I use my own API key with SpicyChat? + Definitely! You can connect your own OpenAI API key to access the most advanced models and get even better responses from your AI companions. Why was my created character deleted? + Characters may sometimes be deleted, especially if they violate the terms of use: no content involving minors, no offensive or disturbing content. If you think this is a mistake, please contact support. Ready to explore unlimited NSFW chat? Discover what it’s like to chat with an AI that never judges you! Visit Spicychat.ai website

short_description: Access over 800 specialized courses in artificial intelligence on Coursera. Learn how to use AI tools or master machine learning.
full_description: Coursera AI : Artificial Intelligence Training – Complete Guide 2025 ➥ What is Coursera AI? The Coursera learning platform currently proposes several hundred courses in artificial intelligence. This section dedicated to AI is the result of collaborations with prestigious institutions such as Stanford, MIT and Harvard. The programs are structured to support both beginners and experienced professionals as they build their skills. ➥ What types of courses are available? Professional certificates form the core of the program, including the highly acclaimed IBM AI Developer. Participants discover the fundamentals of machine learning, deep learning and natural language processing. Stanford’s Machine Learning specialization maintains an outstanding rating of 4.6/5, with over 100,000 students certified. ➥ Modular learning Training courses take a modular approach over 3 to 6 months. Each week includes instructional videos, practical exercises and assessments. Students progress at their own pace, with the opportunity to review complex concepts. Weekly mentoring sessions help clarify technical points. Teaching videos Practical exercises Active discussion forums Supported by volunteer tutors Real projects ➥ Which specializations to choose in 2025? Flagship specializations include Deep Learning with TensorFlow, AI for cybersecurity and reinforcement learning. The new GenAI Academy offers modules on ChatGPT, DALL-E and the latest advances in generative AI. The programs systematically incorporate real-life projects from the professional world. ➥ Artificial intelligence (AI) training courses Machine Learning and predictive algorithms Deep learning and advanced neural architectures Natural language processing and semantic analysis Computer vision and image recognition Python, PyTorch and TensorFlow Deploying AI models in production ➥ Are Coursera certificates officially recognized?
